desc: I don't understand how this hotel gets soaring reviews from all its quarantine guests, my experience here thus far is summarized by one word - stifling. It's advertised as 28sqm online, but I fear it's actually smaller. Breakfast is probably the worst part of the hotel since we were notified to have our breakfast packed from orchard cafe to be consumed in room. This is P3HA instead of P2HA yet they don't allow dining in of breakfast buffet. The queue of the breakfast was very long, the spread of the breakfast is very poor for a 4-star hotel. Chinese selection only had Chicken porridge with some condiments and fried food, western selection only had the usual

My partner was really touched by everything, and I have to thank Amanda for her big part in it. Thank you for making my staycation such a wonderful experience. I hope you get recognized

title: Staycay

title: Good service
desc: Mr Santhanam is nice and friendly. He helped me a a lot during my quarantine stay over here. Got free unlimited mineral water. Food is nice. Staff is quick and responsive. Appreciate a lot. The swab test is well arranged.

title: Wedding reception and bridal suite stay

Breakfast next morning with buttery good scrambled eggs was mouth watering too. I very much recommend orchard hotel. Other mentions: Thank you Hua Ting Restaurant for preparing our food. It is definitely a Michelin star award restaurant. Thank you chef and their service crew who is always attentive to our wine glasses and the surroundings.

title: Wedding and bridal suite.
desc: Orchard Hotel is a hidden gem that deserves bigger recognition. My parter and I sincerely thank the service crew, especially Haze and Kevin for excellent work. The room is decent in size, comes with a work desk and side table with an arm chair. This is good for couples to work together in the room. The bed is comfortable and comes with a decent sized TV. The bathroom comes with a shower stall and a bath tub. Enjoyed the stay!

title: Thank you for the smiles
desc: In these unprecedented times, hoteliers work a million times harder to keep a guest happy. I am amongst the lucky guests that Orchard Hotel staff go the extra mile for and my family and I appreciate every single effort from each one of them. My kudos to the entire awesome team and special mention to Chooi Yen, Amanda, Tina, Azrul, Kesh for making my stay a memorable and wonderful one. Check in and check out were smooth. Housekeeping service was impeccable and we observed a high level of commitment to cleanliness. We will be back soon!

title: Pleasant experience
desc: Suresh helped us during the rough period of stay in SHN. Hotel amenities are good. He did good room service and was efficient in attending queries. Hope to stay again here when normal travel resumes soon.

title: 14 day SHN, couldn‚Äôt be better. Thank you team!
desc: Ample storage space, Bath tub and friendly staff made our quarantine stay awesome! + Ample storage & huge wardrobe where you can push your luggage It was a necessity for us since we have too many luggage as we moved back to Singapore from Myanmar. + Bathtub Daily soaking in the tub was a luxury we couldn‚Äôt enjoy at home. Whenever we called the reception for shower

desc: The family room was spacious & nice. We checked in at 230pm but was unable to have a later check out. Think 11am for check out timing, 12pm will be more reasonable. Can walk to nearby places for shopping but may be a bit inconvenient when raining. Overall a good stay.

title: A nostalgic stay - after 22 years

The warm hospitality, clean amenities, and large pool are endearing. While high tea was served to our table, the breakfast spread is reasonable too. Premium Club Rooms situated on the higher floors served TWG tea while the standard room offers tea from the Raffles Lighthouse. Shaver kit is also provided as a default in the Premium Club Rooms. This hotel is situated at the start of the Orchard belt, adding to the convenience of food hunting

title: Family oriented stay

title: Oct 2021 Quarantine Review

title: Excellent Staycation.
desc: Service was perfect, rooms clean and ready for prompt check in. Set hotel room was large with two bits and writing desk area shower area was launched and clean. Coffee House open for use so what's the lounge and nearby there are many good restaurants for lunch and dinner.

title: Short 2 nights

title: Wedding Banquet

Staff at breakfast were rather grouchy and rude when trying to implement the SMM rules. Could be better managed especially since it is the hospitality industry.

title: Pleasant and enjoyable experience for wedding dinner banquet at Orchard Hotel

Thank you to the all the friendly staff around :) Had an overall extremely pleasant experience for the last week of December, and glad to have welcomed the new year in Orchard Hotel. : )

We were

In view of the peak period we anticipated delays etc. And it was not that bad at all that we need to wait for our room to be ready (within 30mins). As a guest, it is only fair we managed our own expectations during this pandemic especially when Orchard Hotel is also a SHN facility and for sure with limited staff strength. But what really gets to me positively during this stay is their IT department. So we brought our gaming system and decided to plug in and realized that the hotel had set some restrictions to its wifi network. I called the Operator and got transferred to a Revnet(i dont recall what it was but it think its Revnet please correct me if im wrong) team and spoke to a pleasant

title: Wedding banquet review
desc: We held our wedding banquet at Orchard Hotel on the 4th of December 2021. It was one of the best decisions made for our wedding. Wedding preparation We would like to thank our wedding coordinator: Haze. Initially signed up for the package back in 2019. With the pandemic, there were lots of uncertainties and changes. Despite that, Haze was always there for us. Her replies were prompt and professional. In general, she was able to accommodate most of our requests and constantly aligned with us on every single detail for our wedding, she definitely made the entire preparation a breeze. Haze deserves a promotion! Wedding banquet (food) We would like to pay Hua Ting restaurant with the highest compliments. Prior to the banquet, we have heard about the good reputation of Hua Ting.

title: Orchard Hotel Family Room
desc: Fabulous and wonderful service from Orchard Hotel especially front desk staff Yu Fei. Room was great and we had a a really good family time. Thank you very much for your hospitality and hope to visit again soon.

title: Incredible stay!
desc: We stayed at Orchard Hotel for 4 nights and it was such a pleasure staying here. The staff were all exceptional. What lovely people who made our first few days in Singapore so great. Nothing was too much for the staff. Particularly Mazelan, Kent & Aeriz were all amazing! We‚Äôll be back!

title: Amazing stay
desc: Our stay at the Orchard Hotel was fantastic. Everyone was very friendly and helpful, especially with all the Covid rules in place. A special shout out to Mazelan the Chief Concierge who helped us with all our bags!

title: Awesome experience, made us feel like home!
desc: My husband and I made a big move this year and now we‚Äôre living in Singapore! Moving to a foreign country in under 3 weeks and during times of Corona and Omicron cases on the rise was even more challenging. But guess what, it was worth the move! We stayed at Orchard Hotel since our arrival and everyone has been so welcoming and nice. Our stayed lasted for a month and we had such a great experience here, the staff made us feel like home! I had a routine, my tummy always happy and full from their extensive breakfast downstairs and then I‚Äôm off to explore the city. The staff always go out of the way to make us feel comfortable! Thank you team Orchard, Tina, chef Fildah, Aeriz, Fina, Amanda, and Junxian. You made the start of our journey into this country so much better!

title: Easy check in and friendly staff
desc: I would like to thank Irene and Yen for the fast and easy check in. They were fast to check far my last minute request. Thank you so much. The room i had was spacious and peaceful. I had a great stay.

title: Cozy hotel and great service!
desc: Our stay in Orchard Hotel is very cozy and fantastic! First staycation of the year and it did not disappointed us. The staffs were all very friendly and helpful, especially the front desk staff, Kent, attentive to our needs and request! The breakfast was good and the staffs were polite too. Overall, it was a great stay for us to relax! First time in this hotel but not the last! Definitely recommend to our family and friends!

title: Great services!
desc: Customer services is excellent! Did early check in at 1pm and room was ready. Staff went the extra mile to do simple deco (few balloons) for our room and provide complimentary cake. Thanks to orchard hotel teams! Will definitely return for next staycation.

title: Staycation
desc: We love this Hotel very.much. The service and the staff are superb. The deluxe room is spacious too, very clean and all the items are well maintained and polished. Definitely I want to comeback again in near future! :)) Thank.you!

title: A few tiny issues in the bathroom but overall, good stay
desc: We were supposed to stay at Tanglin Club for 3 nights before moving over to my brother's house, but a couple of days before we left, we found out that we couldn't stay there until we got our PCR results back from the test we take on arrival. So, after a frantic search on the internet, we were thankfully able to book a night's stay at Orchard Hotel. We arrived in Singapore around 10pm and we were checked in at the hotel around 11:30pm. We got a small but nice room with 2 twin beds which was perfect for my son and I. All we needed was a good shower and a comfy bed for the night. Unfortunately, the bathroom had a couple of small issues. The shower is one of the strongest showers we have had and when I turned it on, the shower head turned towards me and blasted me with cold water.

title: Splendid experience!!!
desc: Was celebrating my anniversary today and orchard hotel surprises me with a wonderful anniversary treat, so sweet of them!!! Great service, great experience. Will definitely arrange another stay here again!üòÜ

title: Pleasant Stay
desc: Arrived earlier than check in time but was given a room straightaway. Security was tight at the lift lobby where all identity of the guests were required to be presented before gaining access to the guest rooms. All visitors are required to be registered before accessing the room. There was a great variety of breakfast available and did not had to wait for a table.

title: Excellent service
desc: Great service and clean rooms great service to Perlin, staff was really friend and the breakfast buffet was nice. Cozy and nearby to many amenities in town such as claymore connect orchard towers and many others.

title: Excellent service
desc: I immediately got help with my luggage the moment I arrived at the front door. The luggage was sent to my room shortly after my check-in. Very friendly and highly efficient front desk receptionists. The breakfast was good and the waiters were very polite. An excellent overall experience staying there one night.

title: Heartwarming
desc: Thank you once again to Yen and team for the hospitality and delightful services rendered on New Year‚Äôs Day. My wife and I were so happy to receive our usual room, which made every minute the most memorable experience. We hope you enjoyed the small token we left you at the front desk. Cheers.

title: Appreciation to Kelly, Amanda and Miuccia
desc: Stay at Orchard hotel was very pleasant! Love the spacious room and comfy bed. Requested for early check-in and the staff at front office (Kelly, Amanda and Muiccia) gladly accommodated to my request and gave constant status on the room availability and rang me up immediately once there was room available. Great service by them, really appreciated it!! Would love to be back again!

title: Lovely and wonderful service.
desc: What a spendid way to start off 2022 with quick getaway in the city to unwind ourselves from our busy schedules. Special thanks to Yen and the front desk crew for going the extra mile and ensuring everything was in order including check-in, the bed, the pool, the facilities and desserts. Orchard Hotel will always have a special place in our hearts and we definitely will be back. One-two-five-zero.

title: just ok...
desc: had 3d2n staycation with my friend in grand deluxe twin room. the room size was ok but it was a bit dim..only 2 table lamps and 1 standing lamp for the entire room..would be great if there was main ceiling and headboard lights to brighten up the room as the main furniture is already dark wood color. cleanliness needs improvement. the vanity area above the safe box had lots of visible dust flying around esp when u use hairdryer. i cleaned the area with wet tissue but still lots of dust. some hairs on the floor and still the same even after housekeeping. the sheets were not the most comfortable and we asked the housekeeper to change them. he said ok but we realised he did not change at all. didn't manage to use the pool as it was raining throughout but decent size. used the

title: Good place
desc: Good place to visit and stay. Food was nice and room is comfortable and clean. Recommend for people to consider staying. There are connivence stall and atm nearby for people who want to purchase stuff at night

title: Happy visit
desc: Stayed over the rainy weekend, and the staff were really friendly, making my short stay a cozy and pleasant one. A big thanks to Yen for checking me and my partner in smoothly, and also to Amanda for assisting my queries enthusiastically in the evening. Thank you for making my stay great! Will visit again!

title: Excellent Service
desc: Great service, staff were very accommodating throughout my stay here. Room & amenities were also very clean. Very impressed with their social distancing measures in place. Special mention to Perlin for her assistance and service

title: Great service!
desc: As I was early for my check in, I asked Aeriz if it was possible to check in earlier cause I was early, like 1pm or so? Then he said yes that I was able to, and asked if there were any other request as before that I asked if I could change from a king sized to a twin sized bed. I continued to ask him what were the other request that other people asked for, and he said like higher floors, better views etc. I told him, if its possible then I will like to request for that too! But if it was not possible, it was fine as I don‚Äôt want to mafan him, so whatever will do. (I was early and I didn‚Äôt want to bother him) however, he made it possible still and politely told me that he had tried his best to accommodate to all my request that I have, and I was really thankful for that! Also,

title: Wonderful staycation at Orchard Hotel
desc: This was my 2nd stay here at Orchard Hotel, we received a warm welcome by guest experience manager Chooi Yen. The check-in process was fast and all the staff were very professional. I would like to personally compliment the superb customer service provided by Chooi Yen and her guest experience team.

title: Best Staycation Venue
desc: World class service by Orchard Hotel. Special mention to Perlin for being so accomodating and helping us have a wonderful stay. We were also served with good mornings and great breakfast by the chefs. Will definitely come back again!

title: Great Hotel
desc: The hotel is clean, and service staff are friendly. The room is also comfortable, clean and big with adequate amenities for a happy stay. The food served is also delicious! Special thanks to Perlin for your top-notch service and attentiveness to our needs.

title: Great service at Orchard Hotel
desc: I am very pleased and impressed by the service provided by Jerry who attended to us at the counter and ensured our hotel stay went well. He even wrote a note for us along with the complimentary item. Thanks!

title: Ms Juwita
desc: Was a splendid staycay durin the CNY cum celebrating my younger son birthday. Service was great from startin til the end, especially during the check in on CNY eve despite the long Q, as many counter was open and ground staff assisting efficiently. Giving Two thumbs up to Mr Aeriz for his kindness and courtesy rendered to us. Beautiful staycay indeed! Well recommended for Orchard Hotel!

title: Wonderful Service!
desc: Wonderful stay at hotel! Clean, large and comfortable room. Hotel staff are all very friendly. Would specially like to commend Aeriz (front desk) and Tina (resraurant) for their awesome service attitude, making guests feel very welcomed and well taken care of. Would definitely return!

title: Bad experience.
desc: Compared with other hotels in Singapore, this hotel has the smallest room, no bath tub as written in Klook bookings there is, slow check in, bartender at lvl 1 was misbehaving shouting happy new year happy new year when there's no one around and worst of all check in at 3pm and book out at 1pm and no booking available for swimming till 12 the next day.

title: Wedding
desc: We booked the hotel for my friend‚Äôs wedding. The check-in was pleasant. The staff were nice, friendly and thoughtful. We were greeted by Aeriz with a small surprise. After the wedding event, the staff approached us and ask us if we needed help with the heavy items. Thank you so much!

title: Excellent experience in Orchards Hotel
desc: Good customer service from the staff Jerry who is helpful and friendly. An enjoyable staycay in Orchard Hotel. Breakfast buffet has lot if choices and the room is clean. It was very worth with the price

title: Clean hotel, efficient and helpful staff
desc: The hotel and hotel rooms were clean. The front desk, Amanda was efficient and friendly. Jun Wei/Jun Wen helped us with the printer as well which saved us alot of trouble. Thank you Amanda and Jun Wei/Jun Wen for your great service :)

title: Amazing experience.
desc: Had a delightful staycay with my love and it was amazing. Was warmly welcomed by Staff Santhanam who was kind and a delight to speak to. He helped us through our check in processes and to navigate through the hotel. Will definitely visit again. The only down part was that the tv did not support any audio from my laptop when we were trying to watch movies. Otherwise, all good! üëçüèø

title: Commendation for Mr. Darren Chan, Orchard Hotel Singapore
desc: I had some documents that needed to be printed out. Mr. Darren Chan of Orchard Hotel Singapore was very helpful and accommodating throughout the process. It took quite a while but he was patient and professional. Great job!

title: Staff Review
desc: I would personally like to thank your staff named Aeriz for his excellent service! He assisted us in all our enquires and even went the extra mile for us. It would be great if theres a staff like Aeriz in all of the hotels. :) Great job!

title: . Friendly staff and comfy
desc: Hotel staff. Suresh Bellman offers good service as requested. Room cleaning by the lady doing well done when making up the room (1350). Excellent service! Keep up the good work! Both of them deserved 5 star rating!

title: A nice long stay
desc: Orchard Hotel Singapore is a good place to stay for the short or long term in Singapore. We have stayed there for more than a month now. Nice facilities and pleasant staff. Front desk manager Darren, doorman Santhanam and poolside staff Rose, are all very nice and helpful.

title: Pleasant experience & Amazing service and staff
desc: Orchard Hotel provided a wonderful experience for my guests with impeccable and top-class service. The staff provided timely assistance and went above and beyond to exceed expectations. Would like to specially thank Elleen, Kevin and Ariff for their commendable work ethic and commitment.

title: Above and beyond
desc: The staff at the Orchard Hotel were great. I had a large and awkwardly sized item of luggage that was delivered to the hotel, and I then needed to get to Changi Airport. All the arrangements were seamless and everyone could not have been more helpful. You learn if a hotel provides good service when something difficult arises. The staff at the Orchard Hotel were just outstanding, as well as being unfailingly courteous and effective. I couldn‚Äôt speak more highly of them.

title: One of a kind service
desc: I was one of the representatives for a work conference held at orchard hotel. The service provided by banquet manager Mun Ket, Kevin and AV manager Arifin were top notch throughout the 3 days. They also went above and beyond to assist whenever they could without any hesitation, accommodating to the different requests we had.

title: Great service from the Banquet staff!
desc: Went there for an event hosted by Business China. Enjoyed the environment there, and the banquet staffs are helpful and friendly too! I will definitely back there for a staycation in the future. Folks can consider their ballrooms for events or weddings too. Highly recommended.

title: Family Staycation
desc: Hotel was located in a pretty decent part of Orchard Road, though the nearest MRT train station is quite a distance away‚Ä¶.about 15~20 mins walk. Shopping malls are also located in this area like Tangs Plaza, Lucky Plaza, Ion Orchard & many many more. Checking in & out was a breeze. No hassle. For room wise, pretty standard. Small but that depends on the choice of room selected. Clean with no odour. Bed was comfy with good pillows (not too soft or hard). Bathroom was slightly a squeeze. Shower cubicle can be improved. Floor will be wet through seepage between the gaps, even though with the sliding door closed. Restaurants & Food courts are plentiful here. The hotel itself has a cafe that serves quite a buffet spread for breakfast but not so for dinner. Quality is decent.

title: Our April stay
desc: We thought thd breakfast choices were very minimal, not much western style to choose from. Very comfortable beds. Zahir, a concierge was very helpful and polite Mazelan Mhd Ali also was very helpful and polite. All in all, we had a pleasant stay

title: Good business hotel, some amenities not as they were pre Covid-19
desc: I have stayed at this hotel several times over the years. This is my first stay for 2 years due to Covid-19. The hotel remains smart and well cleaned. I stayed in a different tower this time, rooms are quite small but well appointed. There was a lack of hot water for several days which I reported 3 times, things eventually improved. I stayed in an executive room which previously had access to a business lounge, happy hour and 2 items of free laundry. The lounge is not open and there was no free laundry. This was disappointing. I like the Orchard and hope it's normal services for business travel return quickly.

title: Average. Overprice Buffet Dinner but kudos to the service crew @ Orchard Cafe
desc: Booked a staycation on Gd Friday 15 to 16 Apr. Expected some queue during check in. What impressed me was the promptness of the front desk crew. Upon seeing the queue started to form (which indeed was long), the crew was quick enough to open more check in counters to cater for the guests. My check in was done within 30 mins by a friendly front desk agent (lady with short hair). Booked a superior twin and was assigned a room on level 16. Cosy size. Couldn't expect much. Tolietries provided. Overall seems ok. Decided to try the dinner buffet @ Orchard Cafe. Given the variety that cost $90 (after 30% millennium member discount), I would suggest to catch your meals around the area instead. Food was average. No hot or cold dessert available. However, I would like to compliment the

title: Good service with kenta
desc: Very helpful, kind and patient. Provide all the information I needed. Works very fast. Can organize the connecting room for me because my mom is just have an operation so needed the connecting room üëçüëçüëçüôèüôèüôèüéÅüéÅüéÅ

title: Very helpful staff
desc: Right from my first contact with staff, checking in with the track and trace app, to my checkin experience after an overnight flight staff could not have been more helpful. Aeric at reception was wonderful an I was soon able to relax and refresh before exploring Singapore

title: Decent stay
desc: Room is recently renovated which is greag, and the location is within Orchard area (although not too close to MRT). Clean and decent size room. Comes with a proper work chair and desk, sufficient amenities. Breakfast was standard though and quite crowded.

title: Wedding & Staycation
desc: Wedding Banquet Service - Attended my friend Wedding on 08 May 2022 and I‚Äôm really thankful to have Mun Kiet and Arifin assistance throughout the entire event. I‚Äôm part of the bridal party team and as well as the emcee. I was feeling extremely nervous but Mun Kiet has always been there and always assuring us with comfortable words and it definitely calms us down. Honestly, Mun Kiet and Arifin really outdone themself. A big round of applause for them! Wedding Food - The food are normal. Not fantastic. I guess there are some mistake made by the Wedding Sales Coordinator. We are quite displeased with the services provided by them. Staycation - Room are pretty small but it was quite cosy and comfy. I‚Äôm also quite surprise that it came with a bathtub! A comfortable experience!

title: Excellent Service in the Premium Club
desc: Everytime I enjoyed the very warm personlized service from Jen. Great food and drinks. Excellent Service in the Premium Club. The hotel has also a huge variety at breafast time and nice amenities such as gym

title: Odd Booking Experience - Otherwise Average Stay
desc: The stay itself was average - the room was adequate for a one-person one-night stay, but I wouldn't strongly recommend it either. The good - bed was comfortable, shower pressure was good, water and coffee in the room. Location is also good, on the quieter side of Orchard Road. The bad - the room is dated, the bathtub is shallow and tiny, and breakfast was a chaotic affair with not much coordination. In and of themselves, this would still mean a 3 star. But the prebooking was very weird. I booked a room on a rate that was stated as including "free cancellation" as long as I cancelled with at least 2 days to the date I was supposed to stay. On 30 January, I booked a stay for 22 March. However, due to some changes in schedule, I brought it forward to 8 March. Unbeknownst to

title: Kudos to Ms Santi and Mr Ariffin
desc: I conducted 2 training workshops on the 5/6 May & 12/13 May at Orchard Hotel. I would like to laud the excellent service provided by Ms Santi who provided the food and beverage and Mr Ariffin, who ensured that the AV setup was tip top. Please convey my appreciation to them for their dedication which contributed to the events' success. Thank you.

title: A complete disappointment.
desc: I was at Orchard hotel with my mom and children(2yr). The staff at restaurant is v unfriendly. Hospitality is below the basic level. Its a complete NO for your vacations. They even Refused to give milk for toddler, didn't respond when we were at restaurant for breakfast. My mom don't understand English, they even told her not to touch things at restaurant in my absence. Hopeless staff !!! Not so great rooms !! I would say a complete NO to orchard .

title: Thank you Kelvin, Joseph, Ariffin and Ms. Geraldine
desc: Fall in love with the opulent ballroom at first sight when we were on venue shopping for our wedding, especially the chandeliers, it's not the normal crystal chandeliers you saw elsewhere! The unique wavy design chandeliers in the ballroom and the floating orchid-inspired ones at the foyer, looks so elegant and grand! The wedding was firstly taken care by someone else and thereafter was taken over by Geraldine, compared to the first lady we've been spoken to, she always responded to our enquiries promptly with patience. The day before, Mr. Kelvin, Joseph and Ariffin assisted us with welcome gift setup, audio and video testing and went through our itinerary to make sure all is in order. They were so patient with our requests and providing us their suggestions. After

title: Wedding Reception at Grand Ballroom
desc: A family member had their wedding reception at Orchard Hotel Grand Ballroom recently. I was glad working with the AV Manager Arif who was very forthcoming and a breeze to work with so that we could have a smooth sailing event.

title: Banquet and Ballroom services
desc: Excellent services provided. Banquet manager Joseph, AV system executive Arifin and staffs are doing their best to uphold the hotel standard. Food is also very good üëç. Highly recommended for banquet .

title: Wedding Reception & Stay
desc: We had our wedding reception at Orchard Hotel, we are extremely happy with the hotel & their exceptional service. From the beginning of our journey till our Big day, we are very happy and satisfied with the hotel staffs professionalism & service. Not to mention the amazing ballroom with spectacular deco. Our families & friends can't stop talking about how beautiful our wedding was at Orchard Hotel. It was simply magical & a fairytale wedding. Thank you to Joseph, Kevin, Don, Effendi & Geraldine from F&B and banquet department. All of you have exceeded beyond our expectations & we will definitely serve as a reference for your future clients. They all made sure our Big day went well & without any hiccups. Thank you so much, we are forever grateful. Thank you Yen from Front

title: Staff not helpful
desc: I left my pants in wardrobe and asked the staff to send it to my friends hotel and said i can pay the taxi or i can order the go send but the staff not help full,start from the reservation i call them at 23.45 pm she said i must come directly to take the pants and then she asked me to call the front desk,well i did call the front desk but he said just drop your number i will call you later,i waited until 1 am no one get back to me,and i decide not to wait my pants,this is simple case that must be easy for to solved, trust me i like the hotel start from check in but then the impression disappear just because of this

title: The worse staycation i ever had!
desc: I requested for a quiet room but had a NOISY one instead! - Noise from the lift and they also reserve one room just opposite my room for their staffs? NOISY!!! The windows in the room were badly stained with algae and i could not even take a proper photo of the view! Worse than budget hotel! The so call " exclusive lounge is terrible" - bread is stale, servings are limited , local delights but NOTHING local - totally not worth the $ The carpet at level 1 6 have a moldy smell and towels are seen thrown on the floor.... staff who walked past did not even bother to pick it up. The only saving grace was the bed & breakfast.

title: Orchard Hotel
desc: The High Tea and Evening Cocktail staff, and food are excellent! The Buffet Breakfast are just normal international buffet. The hotel room service staff are slow, we supposed to stay in Premier King Club room with an extra bed intact. But we have to wait in our room for an hour, to wait for the extra bed and the amenities to be delivered. Bad house keeping of this hotel. Please do improve the speed of these service. Plus we think the extra bed should be set up, and all amenities should be placed, before the guest arrives. Overall, we like this hotel, is nice, cooling and centralised in shopping city. Thank you.

title: Orchard Hotel
desc: First time staying in a hotel in Singapore and it was pleasant. Check in was smooth and staffs were friendly. Was here with my friend so we decided to get a bigger room, the room had access to the lounge as well as complimentary laundry which was good. We came to the lounge almost everyday for tea and evening cocktails and was always greeted by the staffs. Ian the staff that served us most of the time was brilliant. He was quite shy but we still managed to talk to him and he always puts a smile on my face. At the same time, Yen another staff is a very good role model for others as she always maintain a high quality of standards that will certainly contribute to this hotel's business. We will certainly be back again.

title: Good
desc: Breakfast was quite slow therefore i didnt want to wait any longer and went to the club lounge for the first time. The afternoon tea and evening cocktail was excellent! Special mention to staffs ian and le qi as they really welcomed me with open arms and kept asking me if i wanted more drinks. The service they gave made me come to the lounge everyday, aside from that the food there was brilliant. 100% recommended to get the club rooms.

title: Need improvement to make it more business friendly
desc: I had a chance to stay at orchard on a business trip but experience was not awesome. Room amenities were good and functional but hotel needs service attitude. We had to wait everyday minimum 5-10 minutes for breakfast seating once even for more than half an hour. Also Indian breakfast spread needs improvement. Swimming pool was ok but there was no changing room or lockers causing huge inconvenience. They charged us one full day for checking in at 9 Am instead of 3 pm but not willing to extend check out to3 p.m. last day without charging for half a day . I think this is not appropriate to charge somebody for one and half day for 10 hours additional time

title: great location and comfortable
desc: very comfortable and handy to major shopping centers. think twice before you dine in as I found the food is not that good, heaps of varieties but the taste was not there and you pay triple what you get from dining out. very helpful staff...good for its price

title: Biggest hoax ever - not worth the money
desc: We booked a Signature Premium room, as their web site described it as a spacious room, with complimentary wifi and minibar. Yeah, the size of the room was not bigger than a standard room in Singapore, room was next to elevator engine room giving constant noise, and complimentary minibar was an empty fridge. We complaint about the empty minibar, saying that with the extra fee we would have expected to see at least some sodas and juice in it. Response was that they have 2 water bottles and coffee/tea making equipment, and the minibar available, but empty. When pushed, they claimed to have removed the remark of complimentary minibar from their web pages two years ago (they still had that on), as if that would make it right. Hotel is also targeted clearly for SEA tourists, starting

title: Really great hotel
desc: This was a fantastic hotel to start our adventures in Singapore, on check in were really pleased with the room that they had made up for us. Massive bed and sofa bed with a little tippi for the children. The location just off orchard road was perfect and made for an enjoyable few walks to the shops. Breakfast in the hotel was good but could have done with a bit choice on different days. Would highly recommend for families to stay here.

title: Ok stay, needs better service levels
desc: Stayed for a few days recently with family. Check in took 35 mins with no queues- far too long and laborious. Room was ok, clean if a little small. Shortage of staff at reception and concierge at times was frustrating with no apology ever. They have got this wrong. Breakfast was a total scrum every day with long queues to get a table after 8am. Have your breakfast early. Actual food was ok - typical variety, but experience is spoilt by the scrum. Hotel is 5 minutes walk from Orchard MRT so very convenient location, albeit that on walking back to the hotel from the MRT later at night you will encounter prostitutes in front of Orchard Towers at the junction between Orchard Road and Claymore Road. No problem but be aware. Overall a good-ish stay but we will not stay there again.

title: wedding and accommodation 26 aug 2022 to 29 aug 2022
desc: me and husband decided to have our wedding at Orchard hotel singapore. Thank you so much SUNSHINE GARCIA and the team! You guys are all amazing, kind, professional, attentive, on point answering back to emails, calls, changes and concerns. You all made my wedding beautiful and more than what I expected! It was a full Malay tradition wedding with seated Chinese halal cuisine which was customized to our family taste buds! We also booked almost 20 rooms that the hotel managed to arrange nicely for our family. All my family members were so happy during their stay here. For me and my husband we got the bridal suite which was big and comfortable. Overall, They helped our magical weekend wedding dreams come true. They were always very patient, responsive, and are in the know with the

title: Wedding dinner
desc: We had a pleasant stay during my birthday at Orchard Hotel and that is why my husband and I decided to have our wedding at Orchard Hotel. Initially, there were a little hiccups here and there as the person in-charge of our wedding kept changing within a year. We were very worried when our wedding date is approaching and we do not even know who to contact. Thankfully, we have Sunshine, our wedding coordinator. Even though she is new, she is responsive to our messages and email. She is also responsible to keep us updated of our external wedding set-ups by sending us photos to keep us reassured. Special thanks to Mr Arifin and his team for allowing us to test our montage and he even guided us on how to walk down the aisle before our actual day. We are very thankful to meet Mr

title: One Week Stay
desc: We stayed here for one week while my husband was visiting Singapore on business. My favorite part of this hotel was the breakfast. Each day we went down and had little to no wait to get seated even though the hotel was very busy. The people at the buffet worked so hard to get tables cleaned, people seated, and the food kept fresh and hot. I was happy to start each day with a solid meal that included a plethora of choices from many cuisines to try. For the rest of the day, there are many dining options nearby, and the MRT was about a 10 min walk up Orchard Rd. The rooms are cozy, and I especially liked the shower. They have self serve washer and dryer, but it did cost me $32 to do one full load through the washer are dryer. Also, there was a decent grocery store on the lower

title: Sumptuous Dinner
desc: Hi. it was a great night to remember. me and my family were really enjoy our dinner buffet at the TOC. We really enjoy the chilli crab at the Chinese Section . Taste everything on point. But what really make us feel like we are back on 80's @ 90's was the authenctic malay cuisine. we really like the prawn in spicy tumeric gravy with pineapple. really take us back when our late grandma always cook for us when have a chance. The gravy not so thick no so watery it just on point. Spicy level is really nice and taste well. not to forget the okra sambal, superb that i can say. Kudos to the chef for good food. Surely will comeback for next new authentic menu. Overall western also really good, Only the indian section everything was really thick where we can really enjoy it. 10 star

title: Stayed in a Premium Room and it was shocking
desc: Stayed in Room on the 6th Floor (2 Floors above Pool). It was an upgrade to my reservation and I was shocked at its condition. The window was covered with algae, so it was not possible to look outside. It had the appearance of a fish tank which hadn't been cleaned in years. It rained during the night and I woke up to water which leaked into the room. Upon inspection, it was obvious that the glass was unsealed and the frame was deteriorated. In the pictures, you can see how they made past plaster repairs which did nothing to solve the leak problem. The room smelled dank from the repeated leaks (Singapore = rain) and their maintenance was clearly incompetent as was obvious from the buckling plastic and cracks. The bed sheets had blood stains. The shower head was broken. There is a

title: Amazing Staff
desc: My room and my stay was wonderful but what really sets this hotel apart is their staff. Everyone I received service from seemed cheerful and genuinely happy to help. My room was impeccably serviced by Nancy. (Thank you!) Harun at the front desk made sure our breakfast experience and other arrangements were first class. Their bartender had all of our names down the first night as well as our favorite drink. While the smiles and service felt genuine everywhere, the service at the premier lounge is exceptional. I would like to thank Gigi, Miss Yen, Le Qi, Ian, Sheryl and Praveen for providing us with stellar hospitality. Your professionalism and service reflect very highly on the hotel's management regarding their business acumen and hiring practices. Thank you all so much!

title: Old, tired and run down hotel
desc: This hotel would be a lot better if it didn't have so many maintenance issues. Our Aircon was leaking and flooded our hallway whilst we were out. We moved rooms but then the shower wouldn't drain in the new room. Also when flushing the toilet, the toilet water spouted out of the button, it was really gross. The bathrooms are tired and in need of a facelift. Beds are pretty comfortable tho and the hotel staff are very helpful and friendly. Hotel just needs a revamp. Also avoid the breakfast option. We didn't choose this as part of our stay but every morning when we left the hotel, there was a queue out the door for guests waiting to be seated. There are so many options around the city for breakfast, why pay for hotel food when you have the best eats right on your door step -

title: Very Happy Staycation
desc: Very good location and beautiful ballroom. First time staying at the hotel to attend my cousin wedding. Superb services from the time we came in. We had few rooms and had a wonderful time. The rooms are very spacious and clean. Very convenient with nearby Cold Storage near us. Staff friendly and always pleasant especially when we pass through lobby including the management. Couldn‚Äôt swim as it was raining but hope to come back for another staycation. Check out was real easy, just drop the keys in the box as we have paid our rooms in advance. Highly recommended for those who wants to be in Orchard belt for easy shopping, dine and great service!

title: Nice Hotel
desc: I visited Singapore for Business trip for whole week and I stayed at Orchard Hotel The location is in strategic place, close to shopping area, Lucky plaza , Takashimaya.. The room is clean, convenience, and breakfast is nice, little bit queuing in the morning but overall are OK and recommended.

title: Nice stay at Orchard
desc: The hotel location is at the end of Orchard Road. Bus stop was very close. Hard Rock was pretty close. My room was comfort and clean. The breakfast was excellent, but I had to wait a while to get a table. I took dinner at restaurant and there was live music.

title: Tiny rooms. Not worth for money
desc: Terrible services. For the first time a hotel charged me for ice cubes. Tiny rooms. No space at all. The reception was too slow and unfriendly. The concierge was very helpful. Will not recommend anyone. The location was helpful. Breakfast queue was more than 45 minutes.

title: $5 SGD for an ice bucket‚Ä¶ üôÑ
desc: $5 charge for an ice bucket‚Ä¶ Never ever ever have I encountered this. Shocking from an old hotel, loud, chaotic in the lobby 24/7 and badly in need of a refresh. Location great but the services and amenities are sub par. Especially when nightly rates are $420 SGD. Will never stay here again.

title: Orchard Cafe
desc: Here for a farewell dinner, good ambience. Excellent food, excellent service. Staff friendly, price reasonable and will definitely be back again soon. Recommended for all to come for celebrations or even a simple meal.

title: Great business dining and location
desc: We had a business celebration and they arranged perfectly for us. The location is near our office and convenient for everyone to reach. Wide range of food. Try them in bite sized before deciding on favourite.

title: Shop, Shop, shop
desc: Our room was very clean, city views and right in the heart of busy Singapore. Although very busy we were pleased our room was quiet and we could rest soundly after a busy business trip. The hotel is so close to all the shopping of Orchard Rd. Which was fabulous. Our check- in experience was the only downfall‚Ä¶.it took 40 mins!

title: Dinner at Orchard Cafe
desc: We had a farewell dinner for a colleague on 31st Oct .Thoroughly enjoyed the dinner and the buffet spread was fantastic. Thank you very much to Mr Jati ( Director of Food & Beverage ) & Mr Nick Chia ( Executive Assistant Manager ) and their team.

title: LOCATION IS THE ONLY REDEEMER!
desc: Hotel is popular because of its prime location on Orchard Rd. Other than that, everything else is VERY ordinary. Clearly they are having staff issues so service really suffers. So your issue starts at check in. And continues. Particularly at Breakfast. Can you imagine standing in a long queue to get in for breakfast? Then long waits for most stuff there. Very shoddy service by restaurant staff- wont even get you a spoon or a glass of water if you needed it! Clear discrimination between Western and Asian people. Many staff don't speak English. Food was ordinary. They had some award winning restaurant but didn't try that. Rooms are ok sized but OLD. Toilets are way past replacement time but no one seems bothered. Bed is comfortable. Lighting is poor. Everything in need of a

title: service crumbles at Orchard check in
desc: most of Singapore visits the breakfast buffet causing guests to queue for entry .. like they do for check in or any other enquiry of the inadequate number of staff at counter still good value and well equipped rooms though our kettle failed to heat up which resulted in unexpected cold tea at 7 am A few poor apples in the orchard but Singapore sling at the bar was as good as Raffles and half the price good for a one night stay with an excellent breakfast choice ‚Äî served by a core of good staff

title: Good location, caters to all basic needs
desc: Hotel is located on Orchard Street, close enough to the ION Shopping Center and other good shopping spots. Hotel itself is clean, rooms large enough, have all the necessary amenities and are clean. Breakfast was plentiful, however, one has to avoid certain rush hours as the lineups are long... Had the luxury of using the lounge - comfortable and caters to business meetings.

title: Spacious Suite accompanied with Good Service!
desc: No doubt, there is room for improvement but this time i feel it had outshine some of the big boys hotel and deserve a 5 star rating as given. The service rendered remind me why i chose Orchard hotel 12 Years ago for my Wedding Venue. Even though there are some issue regards to my room book. They are settled by a very helpful Ms. Merlin Leman. She had helped me with some arrangement and the booking. She even called me and try to understand more etc. They could have just ignored me but did not. We chose the Premier Suite that is very spacious and comfortable for my family. Upon arrival, I am very impressed with Mr. Alvin Fernz who helped with my check in. He brief us about the club Lounge and etc. And thank you for helping to ensure the surprise birthday arrangement works out!

title: Lovey stay!
desc: Nick was very professional and detailed orientated. He was understanding towards my request, breakfast area was full but service team was efficient. Breakfast variety was bountiful. Had a lovey stay in this hotel. Will definitely come back to stay.

title: Terrible
desc: Very disappointing experience for a 5 star hotel. This hotel seemed completely overwhelmed with guests and the staff clearly could not cope. EVERYTHING that we did involved ridiculous waits. The breakfast was the worst that I have ever seen‚Ä¶‚Ä¶it was like a zoo‚Ä¶..and very disorganised. When we checked in we asked if somebody could bring our cases up to our room, to which she replied ‚Äúcan you take them?‚Äù‚Ä¶..pretty bad for a hotel of this alleged 5 star category. Would definitely not stay here again I‚Äôm afraid as it just wasn‚Äôt good enough for what we paid.

title: Unexpected Singapore visit.
desc: Stayed here for 1 night after unexpected Singapore visit due to flight being delayed to London after being in Australia for over 3 weeks. Excellent hotel with all meals being paid for from airline. The only thing was it was a bit far out of town. Would probably stay here again if returning to Singapore.

title: Good service
desc: Best Location and cross to Orchard where there are ample shops and malls to do windowshopping for buy what you feel the best. Breakfast is good and enough time to enjoy a good meal with various type of food. For a vegetarian ample vegetarian food to enjoy a good breakfast. A standard restaurant for dine in.

title: First impressions are important
desc: First impressions matter. After a tiring overnight flight when u reach the hotel, expectation is of smooth checkin. We had requested for a king size bed while booking. We were checked into a small room with a queen size bed and when checked they insisted its a king size..finally they changed it but could have been avoided. After that, I would say it had everything you would see in a std hotel. Nothing that stands out.

title: First time visit
desc: A pleasant stay overall although the light switch operation for the room may be a bit of a challenge. Everywhere we went, we found it clean and a relaxing atmosphere. Wide variety of breakfast options and the food was delicious. Staff efficient and polite.

title: Good location hotel but rooms and service not to par
desc: Need to put more effort in the room as bathroom condition is old. Water from bath cannot go out.. Room near lift is noisy whenever lifts moves. check in and out too slow. Staff are great. Breakfast is great.

title: Very clean comfy hotel
desc: Very clean and the Room facilities are very good. Compared to other hotels in the vicinity this hotel is value for money with 5 star facilities. Except for staff attitude during check-in, all the rest of the hotel facilities are too good.

title: Satisfactory
desc: The hotel is at good location. The restaurant is not big enough and the guests had to queue up for breakfast. The room light is insufficient and need to improve. Bathroom/toilet very slippery and key card at the wall is not working.

title: What a breakfast buffet!
desc: We stayed here for one night in January 2023. The hotel is conveniently located at one end of Orchard Rd - very close to plenty of shops and restaurants. By taxi from the airport it was about 20-25 minutes. Our rooms were large and clean with all the modern amenities. The bed was very comfortable. Service from all staff members was very courteous. The highlight was the extensive breakfast buffet. There was a huge choice from a variety of cuisines (Chinese, Indian etc). We could have stayed there all day! We will definitely consider staying here again when returning to Singapore.

title: The location alone is great but it‚Äôs the service and friendly staff that makes a stay here worth considering.
desc: What an amazing experience staying at the Orchard Hotel. At the top end of Orchard Road, it‚Äôs perfectly located to explore the top-end shopping, local and specialty food, cocktail bars and nightclubs. On the ‚ÄòHop on Hop off‚Äô big bus route, train and bus routes. The hotel was what made our stay special. From the friendly and extremely helpful concierges, Ali and Maidin , then through the efficient reception up to our room, the ambiance and mood is one of traditional sophistication.

title: Review for Orchard hotel
desc: Although the stay was generally good, the service needs to be improved. Coffee cups in the room were not cleaned and towels were missing,. Once I called for towels they put them on the toilet which was open. Breakfast could be chaotic with long queue to get a seating in the weekend. Plates for breakfast were not cleaned well. Pool is good and gym is ok.

title: Mrs
desc: the concierge guys are so friendly , nice and helpful to me its Mr Ali and Suresh. its very good experience at this hotel the service is excellent . and im loooing forward to go back to singapore and stay at Orchard Hotel again üòá

title: Spacious clean rooms but bathrooms need serious attention
desc: We were on the 6th floor in a room saving the swimming pool. The bedroom itself was spacious and clean. However the bathroom tiles were mouldy. The undermounted sink too was mouldy around where the silicon was. We also found SOMEONE ELSE‚Äôs socks left under the bed! If it wasn‚Äôt that I was sick in bed with food poisoning(not from eating at the hotel) I would have requested for a change of room. Apart from that, guest services at the front office was very helpful and courteous. Breakfast was fantastic. Great location with really convenient access to major stores and eateries.

title: Good location and stay on Orchard Rd
desc: The hotel is in a good location on Orchard Rd. Good quality for money with the location and price. Hotel getting a bit out dated. We got a free upgrade to a bigger room with Millenium membership. Buffet breakfast is nice but seems same one same one each morning, no real change. Air con in the room is excellent but the noise from street and from nearby plumbing is very noticeable.

title: Nice Hotel
desc: Very nice. But slow checkin. But over all very nice stay. I can recommend the hotel for others for sure! Food was very good and the service was also. I will defiantly come back again for another trip.

title: Awesome hotel
desc: Before our trip, we were concerned about our arrival time. But The hotel manager corresponded to our inquiries promptly and answered all of our questions. Very friendly. We arrived at 2 am in the morning and got checked in very quickly. The location was great. Very close to everything. Quiet and safe. There‚Äôs no shortage of food choices at different prices. For the first time ever we didn‚Äôt use public transportation because the taxi fares were very affordable and readily available. The room was nice, clean, quiet, and spacious. Elevators were always quick. We didn‚Äôt try the restaurant or in room service. Highly recommended.

title: Business stay
desc: Lovely hotel in a central area, a short taxi from all the main tourist attractions. Staff are very friendly, and keep the hotel quite clean. Local amenities are there for any need, and being close to a major shopping district was a plus.

title: Not a bad hotel but Misleading advertising
desc: The hotel is reasonably well located and the lobby area is nice. Bed is comfortable. However the room was dated (including the TV) and the bathroom in particular needs to be renovated. Signs of poor maintenance and patch up jobs evident in the bathroom.

title: Customer Service?, what Customer services........?
desc: In these days of high inflation and rising costs, couple with increased competition, customer service is everything. Unfortunately, Millinnium in Singapore failed miserably. I am not staying here again, but buyer beware.......

title: Surely to return
desc: Check in was fast by, Reception Roy. Friendly and all information been inform nicely. Thank you Roy!The room is nice, clean and nice view facing the swimming pool. Quiet location, good for staycay for me and my son. Been approched by Mr Nick Chia during the stay at the lobby. A nice and friendly gentleman. Overall the staffs is a thumbs up!. Room and lobby are clean. Good location around town. A sure to come back again! No regret! #644 / 25 Feb

title: Singapore Short Stay
desc: Fabulous hotel on Orchard Road Singapore Quality accommodation- Breakfast was fantastic. Great friendly and helpful staff - nothing was too much to ask them. Very willing to assist. Close to shops and transport. Highly Recommended

title: Very bad experience
desc: I had the worst experience in Singapore with this hotel. The staff was having trouble check in and check out and in restaurant for breakfast. I would never suggest to stay in this hotel. Moreover rooms were not clean and bathroom taps were broken.

title: Staycay with best friends
desc: Lobby was a little dark. Room was spacious and clean and was glad that prayer direction was included in the drawers. The front desk was not so friendly but helpful with our check-in. However, housekeepers greeted and and gave us a smile. The birthday cake was pretty.

title: Great staff good position
desc: Stayed 3 nights and the stand out experience were the staff. They were excellent. Nice hotel good facilities and enjoyed that it was great n the edge of the ‚Äúinner‚Äù city. Great to walk in all directions. Bedroom was comfortable not overly large for a signature room slept well. Breakfast was a little disappointing plenty of choice but the hot food I had was between lukewarm and cold

title: Great location
desc: My stay was very pleasant. Love the central location which is close to shopping malls. The lunch and dinner buffets were great and the live music was perfect to wind down to after dinner. Will definitely be back soon.

title: The best hotel experience I have had
desc: Great hotel spacious staff were friendly to whoever who looking to have nice this is must stay hotel and guaranteed to make you feel it worth your money . Specially I would like to thanks Mazelan and Suresh when I missing my phone he helped me find back , when I need to help staff are very friendly and helpful . Thank you orchard hotel staff üëç

title: One of the best hotels i stayed in.
desc: Nice Location with mrt near ,clean and very good breakfast buffet with a alot of options for vegans , dishes from asian cuisine so u can try alot and diffrent every day & european breakfast ! The room was very big provide alot of amenities plus they provide every day 4 bottles of water free!The stuff was very friendly 24/7. The value of money was very good.

title: Great Hotel
desc: I recommend this Hotel for anyone who visits Singapore. Great Hotel and Great Location. The staff is friendly and the food was excellent. The overall appearance, the cleanliness, and the service is definitely top notch!

title: Great Stay
desc: Fast and convenient check-in experience, with professional staff. The food was great. An overall vintage feel throughout with the hotel decor. Great location, not so far from major shopping centres in the area.

title: Excellent Stay and Lovely Staff
desc: I recently stayed at the Orchard Hotel for a week long business trip. The stay was excellent with a large, comfortable, and clean room. I was really impressed by all the staff, but particularly the breakfast team in the Orchard Cafe. I was greeted each morning by Tina who was always friendly and professional no matter how busy or rushed. I looked forward to seeing her in the mornings. Thank you for a wonderful stay!

title: Repeat Business Customer
desc: As always, the hotel staff were great. Checking in was painless, the room was clean and tidy. I usually stay at the Orchard 4-6 times a year for 5-7 days at a time. I would recommend the Orchard to anyone travelling on business to Singapore.

title: Great stay
desc: Sally the room service lady did a tremendous job keeping my room clean, tidy and making sure I had everything I needed. Premier lounge was a convenient addition to my stay. Staff at reception were courteous and efficient. I will stay here as often as possible when in Singapore.

title: Orchard Hotel
desc: Excellent! Excellent. V hospital. Kudos and appreciation for the very helpful Emily at Orchard Hotel. She is v good! And thanks to the Orchard Hotel behind the scenes that make our stay memorable one, throwing in an upgrade to a better room, late checkout ! Really appreciated!

title: Bad check in and check out experience
desc: Mr ‚ÄúH‚Äù at front desk was unprofessionalHe had caused me a lot of problems during my stay. He did check in and check out and both had problems. He made so many mistakes that had caused me a lot trouble during my stay

title: Wedding Dinner at Orchard Hotel Ballroom 3
desc: Our wedding was held in March 2023 at Orchard Hotel Ballroom 3, a location that captured our hearts during their wedding showcase. We chose Orchard Hotel because it was challenging to find a ballroom with a high ceiling suitable for a more intimate wedding (~15 tables). We were fortunate to have Shawn as the hotel manager in charge of our wedding. Despite having to bring forward our wedding due to personal matters, Shawn was always available to answer our questions and ensured that everything was prepared within three weeks. His professionalism and dedication made our wedding day unforgettable. The food served was exceptional as well. I would also like to express my gratitude to Ms. Gigi for her exceptional service at the Premier Lounge. We highly recommend Orchard Hotel to

title: Excellent hotel in a good location.
desc: Overall, the hotel is well appointed and in a good location for shops and restaurant. Easy access to the subway is a 10-minute walk. Staff are friendly and helpful. Rooms are well-appointed, clean, comfortable and quiet. The breakfast buffet is good with a wide selection of options. The only negative is the evening dinner buffet. The food is of average quality and grossly over-priced. I would recommend using the many restaurant options that are withing a short walk of the hotel. Overall, I would recommend this hotel and will stay here again next time I visit Singapore.

title: Tina in the restaurant was smiling us at the breakfast lobby every morning. The rooms were perfect cleaned!!!
desc: Service both for room and restaurant was amazing and friendly! Tina was smiling us at the breakfast lobby every morning. The rooms were perfect cleaned!!! You will also find some amazing foods..I loved it

title: Awesome place
desc: It was a pleasant experience here‚Ä¶..staff were so caring and friendly to always putting the customer first.We have been serve with great energy.The food were moderate and the desert were top tier.Will be back here

title: Great hotel with fantastic staff
desc: Great hotel and fantastic staff. The pool is lacking and dull though. The rooms are fantastic, the restaurant is so good and the food is great. They need to have music in the pool and open a pool bar. It‚Äôs so dull

title: very comfortable stay
desc: I enjoyed staying and eating in your Hotel. Many thanks for your greatful servises. If you can set the Japanease TV channel, I might be enjoyed more better. (Channel no.20 didn't work during my stay.)

title: Not so great. Not give it a 4-5 start star rating.
desc: Hi Friends , I am sorry to say but staying in Orchard Hotel did not meet your expectations. Just wanted to share my experience when i stayed in Hotel Orchard . We were 12 ppl ( adult & kids ) staying in orchard hotel When we entered the room, within next 15-20 mins got the room changed as it was not clean properly , Dust in bathroom & leakage in toilet , but these are all ignorable . The main issue for which i am on Trip advisor is that the Breakfast is NOT AT ALL upto mark. I was there for 6 days & all 6 days same breakfast for Indian People in VEG. uncooked vegetables ( Raw / salad ), Idli , Vada , sambar dal ( which is not at all good ) , Maida Prantha , mast potato , egg , Bun , boiled tomato and 1-2 more items which were not at all of our choice. 1). idli not nice ,

title: Helpful Banquet Manager and team
desc: Held an event at Orchard Grand Ballroom. Banquet Manager Eric and team were extremely helpful and assisted in the smooth running of the event. High tea served also received compliments from our guests. Kudos to the team!

title: Would not come back
desc: Don‚Äôt suggest the property due to the lack of bathroom maintenance and attitude of service staff during breakfast. They tried to push a dress code FOR BREAKFAST. I have never seen that happen in any hotel, anywhere in the world

title: Lunch
desc: The food at the orchard cafe is very nice and tasty, with a variation of japanese chinese and western food. The service us also very good, especially Ms Tina who is always looking out for us and helping us.

title: Good service with a smile
desc: Stayed in this hotel for a week for business/leisure. Nice location in the center of the city. Room was okay. Good service especially in the Premier lounge where in I always greated with a smile. Jane was very nice and cheerful, she was the lounge manager i guess. She always makes sure everything is okay whenever I am there she do my fav coffee even before I ask for it. I will surely be back here.

title: Compliment to great service
desc: We had Korean buffet at orchard hotel . It is very nice especially ginseng soup and wide spread of dessert . Thank you for service rendered by Assistant Manager , Tina Soh . During our visit , she has greeted us with big smile and always attentive to our needs and requests .

title: Business trip friendly
desc: Nice location, friendly staff and fast response. Good for business trip booking reservation. Clean room and no bad smell in the room. Properly maintained. Hope to have a longer and not business stay next time. Do not know the perks of a millennium member.

title: Value for money
desc: This property ticks all the boxes for my stay in Singapore Reasonably priced ,spacious rooms compared to other properties in the area , centrally located . Lots of entertainment around the hotel. Staff was very courteous.

title: First buffet lunch for my 13 year old daughter
desc: Had buffet lunch to celebrate my gal's 13th birthday. Sumptuous spread and delicious food. Pork knuckle, pork belly, grilled prawn, laksa, aiyu dessert etc even the coconut macadamia cookie is nice to go with a cup of coffee. Fresh fruits can add a little more excitement though.

title: Good Vibes
desc: The Service Staff(s) are very friendly and professional, food is fresh and tasty :) The variety is awesome as well, keep up the good effort. Thank you everyone for the great experience, highly recommended!

title: Worst Experience Ever
desc: Terrible terrible service! Definitely one of the worst experiences. The front desk assigned a very narrow corner room with a door that could only be ‚Äúhalf-opened‚Äù and claiming that to be normal as all rooms have the same layout. Well, I guess if you are looking for a hotel room with a very narrow design and a broken door, then this will be the ideal place for you to stay. Furthermore, the service is just amazing. Never been to a hotel where the staffs make fun of the guests and being impolite. I guess this is the service standard they are striving for.

title: Lunch at Orchard Cafe - A Fantastiic Experience
desc: The food is excellent, great quality. The service is f.antastic. I like to specially commend Tina Soh for her wonderful service, making us feel like we are having a family feast at home.. Thank you so much, Tina.

title: The Orchard Cafe restaurant
desc: The new menu is interesting and nice. The ambience and new setting is very cosy. I didnt stay in orchard hotel but would love to if there's an opportunity. Ms Tina Soh who served me at the orchard hotel is very friendly and warm.

title: Poor experience. No power socket at bedside!
desc: I don‚Äôt think this is a 5 stars hotel. More like 4 stars. Very poor experience such as. Check out at 11am even though we are gold members. While the suite looks nice, it is Lacking in modern basic necessities such as power sockets at bedside table. There is none! There were two at the study table but only one is working. The rest of the power sockets are located at the most unexpected location such as along walkway or like below dresser table hidden behind a chair where you can‚Äôt even charge mobile phone! Very poor design and not user friendly. Curtains with gaps that leak light in the morning. The worst could be that we cannot order in room dining for breakfast because between 1030am-11am breakfast is closed in the restaurant so we also cannot order in room too. We want to dine

title: Loving it!
desc: 1) Reasonable choices on main couse. 2) Missing a good salad bar/ fruit juice bar 3) Generous spread on deserts, loving it. Churros! 4) Love the relaxing athmosphere 5) Wanna to bring my kids, frigthened they'll get bored and disturb the other guests. 6) Will bring wife on day in June/ July

title: Nice Ambience, Great Service and Good Foodüëçüëçüëç
desc: This is the most memorable birthday celebration that I had at The Orchard Cafe. To my surprise, the assistant manager Tina, together with 4 other male service staff, gathered around my table to sing me a birthday song. Feel so "pai seh" but happy. Thanks for the complimentary mini birthday cake and the great service rendered by all the staff who are friendly and helpful. The buffet lunch was sumptuous and delicious. The seafood are fresh and the assortment of pastry and desserts are great. One of my favourite is the watermelon soju jelly which is refreshing and cooling. The food is very well presented and is above average in terms of taste, except that the Singapore Laksa is a little watery and bland, as well as the pumpkin soup which is way too "buttery" and quite bland with

title: Best
desc: Briyani and dessert was too good and staff santanam and Tina was good. Food set up was excellent. Food top up was done promptly. Food tasted fabulous. Overall, I would rate this place 8/10. Worth the price.

title: good services excellent food
desc: tina solt is very approachable and kind....well trained good service ....hardworking good team leader her teammate is well trained and her teammate offer a good services ......good food services i enjoy a lot.....

title: I love to stay here, and My teens loves it too..
desc: Over All are nice and Clean . I love it. Breakfast always good. Staff helpfull. I love to stay here, My teens love it too. We‚Äôre staying here for 5 days, hopefully the rest of the days Will be as good as our 1st and 2nd day.

title: My small experience in Orchard
desc: Good staff, they are very approachable and very friendly. The room is okay, the bathroom is also very clean. The foods in the buffet are okay but can be better. I suggest that the wifi should be faster

title: Great 4 Star Hotel
desc: Great hotel, breakfast and staffs. The housekeeping service was greats Tao Shliauly was the one who cleaned my room and I was happy with her service. Although the room is not spacious but it is cozy. It is about 800m from ION Orchard. I will definitely come back again.

title: Comfortable
desc: Our room was great, spacious and a nice location! Would stay here again and would recommend anyone with family! I stayed here with my 20 year old daughter and her friend and we had plenty of room! Beds were very comfortable

title: Superb Services
desc: Service is splendid by Johnny. We felt pampered with the delicate services and attention. The food spread is great too. BBQ Satan's, asparagus, prawns are great. Ambience lovely. Thank you and kudosüí™üí™

title: Very good staff
desc: Fantastic stay good food very helpful staff specially Mr damen is very helpful at front desk and good Indian food at all time hotel is very clean and good location at Singapore main market also have all the necessary facilities

title: Gangnam Grill Buffet @ Orchard Cafe
desc: Was pleasantly surprised by the spread and quality of the Gangnam Grill buffet. Staff were approachable and offered excellent services throughout the meal. Good ambience at Orchard Cafe. Would recommend to people looking for a great dining experience.

title: Great hotel
desc: I am staying at the Orchard Hotel for a business trip for 28 days. This hotel is brillant, great pool, gym and location. Staff members Emily and Meina are lovely people who made my stay so enjoyable with their service and professionism. I would seriously recommend staying at the Orchard whilist in Singapore !

title: May 2023
desc: Fabulous 3 nights stay for our first time in Singapore. A little dated but wonderful service, beautiful hotel and great location. I came here with my family upon recommendation from my parents, who stayed here 4 years ago. My mother who had just begun to show symptoms of now diagnosed dementia was well looked after by staff when my father was suddenly taken ill and admitted to hospital. It was a privilege to be able to experience the joy of the Orchard Hotel. Thank you.

title: Eat and Run
desc: The food was excellent. No leftovers!!! Cooks were approachable and easy to take to. Waiters were very attentive and very quick to respond special tina and solt. They provide a excellent service to the guest.

title: Best banquet experience
desc: Organize an anniversary event at the Ballroom. From booking until the end of event, the experience was fantastic. All staff at the banquet are so friendly, helpful and professional. A special thanks to these staff Jacqueline Jati Joleen Bing Eric Goh Kevin Scott Sun Xu Nelson Azri Fazil Joe Patty Chef Johnny Chef Fai Mike Their attention and service is outstanding. The food was excellent. Received so much compliments from many guests for the best experience at the event. Thank you Banquet/ F& B Orchard Hotel

title: Been only staying in Orchard hotel for 10 years. No reward points?
desc: The attention to device is always great. Especially having staff recognize repeat customers. Over the years, Tina Soh always recognizes and greets with a smile. One change in my room would be great. The table lamps are really old and weak. Having power plugs plus USB outlets on the lamps base are the norm now. Thanks in advance.

title: Wonderful experience
desc: That was a very wonderful and comfortable stay i had a good one night stay and InshaAllah come back again and again whenever i need to hotel stay Service are out class Money value able And cooperative staff

title: Staff is very friendly and professional,they make their best efforts to satisfy the customers,I would strongly recommend
desc: The standout feature of my stay, however, was the exceptional service provided by the hotel staff specially customers service Thava . From the warm welcome at check-in to the friendly and helpful servers in the hotel's restaurant, every staff member went above and beyond to make my stay enjoyable.

title: Great hotel My Millennium not so great
desc: Hotel was great but I cannot get my My Millennium membership recognised. How frustrating, The breakfast was fantastic and this requirement to provide 200 words is a pain. I am now up to 200 words so I am finished now

title: best buffet i like
desc: 11/6 we go orchard cafe for lunch.we like to celebrate birthday gathering there.is a nice place n the food is good.yr staff there r very friendly n helpful.especially Tina n Catherine they always greet us with a smile face. i always love the laksa uncle .he is so ni ce n friendly..thats a new staff he told me he only 5 day there.i think his the manager there if im not wrong.he also very nice n friendly.i saw him walking around n check everything there n food.i go there so many time never see any ones do that .he really a nice gug.

title: Great Hotel great Location
desc: Great Hotel food was amazing.Fantastic Location right at the start to Orchard Rd easy walking distance to shops ,Hotel was amazing friendly staff rooms were spotless clean cleaned every day highly recommended great hotel great location very helpful staff

title: Singapore Experience
desc: Rooms are clean and organized. Perfect place to relax. Staffs are accomodating, helpful and kind. Will definitely recommend to my relatives and friends to book and stay at Orchard Hotel. Salute to the management!

title: Location, comfort, service all very good
desc: Hotel is right off Orchard Road, within walking distance of all the world class shopping and F&B amenities the district has to offer. Room was reasonably priced compared to others of similar quality in Singapore. The room itself was spotlessly clean, the bed comfortable, the decor inviting. Breakfast buffet had good quality and variety of dishes. My only criticism is that the hotel seemed very short staffed. The phone rang for several minutes when I tried calling down to reception around 9am. There were long queues at checkin (evening) and checkout (mid-day). Staff were trying their best to keep up with things but visibly struggling ... I wouldn't mind paying just a bit extra to have that extra level of service.

title: Review feedback
desc: Crab is not fresh Otak cooked too many and put there too long. When we take it, its quite hard and taste bad Oxtail soup too salty Food variety too little Sashimi cut not evenly. Some too thick some too thin. The only good is dessert and service If the price for lunch $74++ not including 40% discount from eatigo and with such little food veriety, i feel it is not worth coming back.

title: Well done Evelyn and her Team.
desc: I celebrated my birthday dinner with my friends at Orchard Cafe. The food was decent. Evelyn provided us with great assistance as we were running late and our reservation was cancelled by the hotel. She made sure we found our seats and we were able to truly enjoy the food along with the special occasion of my birthday celebration. Thanks to her.

title: Worst staff and hospitality
desc: Firstly , the way the staff including the Bell boy spoke to us was very demeaning and humiliating. The Bell boy Suresh said he is busy . He needs 20 minutes to get the luggage up to the room from the lobby. Overall the staff don't even have a smile on their face. Their front desk asked us to deal with the Bell boy separately.l for the luggage . This is just tye review after we have entered the hotel. No five star feel.in the hotel. Is it because of the Indians ??

title: Room are big, breakfast are good
desc: Room are big, breakfast are good, staff all nice. They clean room everyday and reffil the water. Bed is big. Location quite far from mrt station but near bud station so okay! Bathroom also big, thank you

title: Not worth the price.
desc: Stayed with the family. Hotel was not worth the price. Small rooms, old toilets, poor service and average breakfast. Very free options in the breakfast buffet. The only good thing is the location. Everything else has room for improvement.

title: Excellent Event Experience at Orchard Hotel Singapore
desc: Recently I organized a 40 tables dinner at Orchard Hotel. I am pleased with the service provided by the service team and the quality of food is good. In all, I would like to thank the below staff who have given my guests a wonderful experience. Special thanks to: Sun Xu, Sahil, Anqi , Jianwei, Joe, Patty, Chef Johnny , Chef Fai, Cecilia, Mike & Jolene.

title: Good selection of Asian and western food
desc: Good selection of Asian and western food, with laksa station, good selection of desserts. Coffee and tea are on the house. Nice ambience and suitable to families and friends. Enjoy the 1 for 1 too! Not too crowded even on a Sunday.

title: Unpleasant birthday celebration at ur premise
desc: 1. Food is not fresh especially the chili crab is soft and smell bad 2. Utensils are dirty. Cups and spoons dirty 3. Appalling that second water charged $7 a bottle. Your buffet is not cheap. Giving water should not be so calculative 4. Also shocking that they don't allow guests to bring own cake for celebration. They also don't give a big cake for guest celebration.
