Then what they expect guests to do .? Asked us to pack the cake we brought once we sing birthday. No wonder there were not many peopl3 eating on a Sunday

title: Business Trip Stay
desc: I had a wonderful tƒ±me stayƒ±ng on thƒ±s hotel. Jane from the lounge is excellent at what she does. She is very attentive and has attention to every detail. She really took care of me during my stay and every visit in the Lounge. Perfect location for my business trip.

title: Great service
desc: Great friendly service my trip was an enjoyable experience staying at the Orchard Hotel. My room was always cleaned with a high standard and well stocked with tea and coffee. I have no hesitation recommending.

title: Excellent hotel!
desc: This is not my first time checking into Orchard Hotel. I enjoy staying in this contemporary yet classic in style hotel as room is clean, spacious, quiet and peaceful, staffs are friendly and hotel location is strategically situated in Orchard road.

title: We had a Ball of a time at Orchard Hotel Ballroom
desc: I held my company's event at the Orchard Hotel Grand Ballroom. It is a beautiful high ceiling ballroom with 2 LED screens and other drop down projector screens, very nice. Orchard Hotel team (Chef Johnny, Su Xu, Didi, Norlela, Fiza and Mike and Business Development Ryan), thank you very much for being so wonderful and accommodating to our needs and last minute changes. Our guests and management were very pleased with the event and enjoyed themselves. Thank you to Chef Johnny and the team for the wonderful western meals. Unfortunately I didn‚Äôt get to finish the nice chocolate dessert running around. I heard it was yummy. I already recommended other companies and one of our guest asking contact for their company meeting bookings. Keep up the great work team Orchard Hotel

title: Not as before COVID..
desc: A bit disappointed as compared to my previous experience in the same hotel before COVID . Room was a bit noisy, breakfast is good but so busy. Staff is good in general but sometimes too busy to really care about you. Check in and check out is really long. Other than that the hotel is well located on Orchad

title: Good Location
desc: Location was very good! Room space was decent, beds could have been a little bigger. Room was also clean and orderly. Hotel staff were very friendly. Easily accessible via bus and mrt. Short walk to bus station.

title: Short visit to singapore
desc: Location is at Orchard road. Friendly staff and good location. The front desk staff were very accomodating. They took care of calling a taxi for us . On other days, the doorman was ready to help us anytime.

title: good coffee bao
desc: i was always out and stayed in the hotel only at night. it was comfortable. not luxurious but enough to give me a good night's sleep. the breakfast spread was good. i loved their coffee bao. i wished they served local coffee :)

title: The hotel and room are so comfortable, always clean, the room is cleaned up every day perfectly 10/10 by Sally, I like e
desc: The hotel and room are so comfortable, always clean, the room is cleaned up every day perfectly 10/10 by Sally, I liked to much all the service provided during my stay in the hotel, also the food is delicious, thank you very much.

title: Happy with the stay and service was very good. Check in was fast and receptionist is very friendly
desc: Happy with the stay, service was very good at receptionist side and very flexible. Check out is fast too as I used express check out. Room is very clean and tidy too. Overall I would highly recommend this to travelers and others to stay here

title: Great service
desc: Staff Tina and Katherine at Orchard Cafe are extremely helpful and ensure our daily meal time seats are well organized when my conpany had an event there in Aug. They give attention to us even when the Cafe is crowded and ensure that the guest gets the right meal as we have diners who ate vegetarian

title: Wonderful first visit to Singapore
desc: First trip to Singapore made easy by the friendly and welcoming staff at Orchard Hotel. The rooms were spacious and the buffet breakfast was a great start to the day. Definitely recommend to anyone visiting Singapore.

title: Great new experience with the most convenient location . I have never been to this end of the city before and it was imp
desc: Had never been to this part of this amazing city before and the Hotel is in perfect location to enjoy the cinemas , malls and great restaurants (Attica /Level 55 ) . What made the stay so great was the staff at every level : club lounge , reception & concierge

title: Satisfied
desc: Okay appreciate job done and the employee her is very friendly appreciate your hard work. You have a talent for attention to detail, and it shows in your work. Good job and Gobless your work and always

title: Such a great experience,Highly recommended
desc: Miss Sally did a great job by cleaning our room every day.. She is such a sweet person and a very hard worker. Our stay @ Orchard Hotel was splendid.Excellent location, Orchard Hotel is a beautiful property with the wide variety of delicious food.

title: Best buffet ever
desc: Had a very good BBQ buffet lunch for my husband‚Äôs birthday. The food combination is great and my son request to come back again for his own birthday. I myself specially like the chili crab and the baked oyster with mentaiko sauce.

title: Average
desc: Overall quite ok for a day use stay. In room dining was good, room condition was much better than ny previous visit in June. Staff at the front desk could be more warm and greet guests when they arrive. Not a smile was seen from any of them.

title: Recommend
desc: Spent 2 nights at this hotel this week. My Room is very clean. Breakfast was good. Hotel is located in the central and convenient for getting around. Friendly staff. In general it‚Äôs worth for the money.

title: Low quality service at Orchard Cafe restaurant
desc: I have a very bad experience at the Orchard Cafe restaurant this afternoon for our NDP buffet lunch. The male staff serving out table (Table #1) totally ignored our request for more cold water and walk away for 3 times while I was having some spicy food and needed some cold water urgently. I was so furious that I have brought this up to the female restraurant manager. title: Pathetic experience. Worst experience of entire life.
desc: No proper bed. We had requested for king bed but they gave a room with two beds joined together. Extremely uncomfortable beds. Tissue box in the washroom was kept empty. And on attending they put a very hard wood inside my bed.. Above all a very very arrogant staff.. Never ever go to this hotel‚Ä¶ Pathetic experience..üò°

title: Great experience.
desc: Had buffet dinner at Orchard cafe. Great great service. Had fun. Staffs are attentitive and act fast. Overall great experience, with some setbacks on food in quality. To be exact are Tuna sashimi not fresh, chili crab and roast beef are forgetable is area of ingredient quality. Beside those 3, this place is beyond expectation. Well done.

title: A terrific hotel at the top of Orchard Row
desc: The Orchard Hotel is an excellent choice for anyone in Singapore on business. Although there are also a number of leisure/tour guests, some of whom can ben annoying at times, the place is spotless and in tip-top shape, also reasonably priced by Singapore standards. The pool is excellent, and the breakfast is the best I've ever had in Asia.

title: Orchard Hotel
desc: Fantastic service from staff and management., friendly and welcoming. Hotel appearance was impeccable. Food and beverage was exquisite, tasted as good as its presentation. Rooms felt very comfortable and was serviced at a high standard, I want to mention our house keeping attendant, his name was ‚ÄòToan‚Äô, thank you so much you were very professional snd highly skilled. Definitely one of the top hotels in Singapore.

title: Lovely Birthday Celebration
desc: The food are fantastic and the service is great. Thanks to Tina Soh for her hospitality. We really enjoy our time here. Recommend the prawns, durian Pengat. Love the satay and oxtail soup. Overall experience is wonderful.

title: Praise and areas for improvement
desc: Leo's services is attentive and thoughtfulÔºåbut about the room setting there's something can be improved. There is no outlet for the hairdryer in the bathroom, so blowing the hair in the bedroom often disturbs the people fall asleep , which I think can be improved

title: Best Buffet in Town
desc: We alway enjoy the wide range of buffet items at Orchard Cafe. Tina n her team of dedicated staffs are alway ready to serve you with a smile n clear your crockery so that u can have a clean table to enjoy your buffet lunch. Good quality remain good.

title: Excellent Service / Friendly
desc: Staff ( Nisha ) was very attentive and anticipated my needs. Excellent service. Food and beverage was appropriate. Very professional. Comfortable environment. I will be back in the near future

title: Lovely Lunch with Friends
desc: Lunch buffet spread was great! We went for 1for1 promo. All food stations has good variety. Great service from Tina Soh and Mariah! Value for money very good Service very good Food Super good! Thank you Chefs and Team.

title: Great Stay
desc: Great Central Hotel for Exploring Singapore! Delicious Breakfast Buffet, many choices, Pillow Menu-love love love for the best nights sleep, lovely Maid - Sally cleaned our room daily to perfection, can‚Äôt fault this hotel! Thank You for your hospitality Orchard Hotel Singapore!

title: A Service Experience at the Orchard Hotel Singapore
desc: I have been impressed with Sally who is part of the housekeeping crew. She is very friendly, does an amazing job with the room and is very attentive to the needs of hotel guests/room occupants. She has good qualities that are hard to come by

title: Beautiful hotel
desc: Its really good experience. I love the hotel service It makes me comfortable in stay and do office work. I am getting all type of food in breakfast(veg, nonveg both) also for me i get indian food to eat. I am thankful for thatüòä

title: Sray
desc: Very nice hotel.. food was excellent and staff are friendly.. requesrs are executed as per customer‚Ä¶ overall, i would recommend and it is easily accessible to mrt and other neans of teqnsport. Lots of shopping malls around

title: Excellent Customer Service
desc: Great customer service special mention to Mr Roy Reception and Mr Ali concierge who went out of their way to assist me in recovering my phone that was lost . Will most definitely come back . Food was also great !

title: Weekend lunch at cafe
desc: Tina Soh has been providing us with excellent service throughout our lunch. We enjoyed our lunch very much. We will definitely recommend our friends to come here for meals. Thank you so much for your service and for a good time here. Coming here on weekends is good cos its not too crowded .

title: Room services & breakfast
desc: Stayed in this hotel for 3 nights, Good room services with all basic amenities and housekeeping team specially Surya attended requests very well. Breakfast timings good, with different menus Asian & intercontinental. Halal food was prearranged as per our request.

title: Will definitely stay again!
desc: The check in was seamless. Upon entering the room, it was cooling and clean. There was an issue with the basin choke which was rectified asap too. The location is quite prime with coffee houses and restaurants nearby. We would definitely visit the hotel again!

title: Very convenient location
desc: Did many dayuse staycations here. Great food room service with 20 percent off. Rooms are a little old but charming. Beds are comfy! Service is prompt and courteous. Will be back again. Did i say the food is great?

title: Orchard Cafe
desc: My 14 family members were there to celebrate my birthday. Tina was especially helpful to find out if my entitled bottle of red wine can be consumed at the cafe. She said according to the regulation I should take it home. It doesn't make sense. I'm given the wine to celebrate my birthday. I told Tina to enquire or allow me to speak to the manager. She was kind enough to ask on my behalf. I hope Alacarte will change this regulation. My family enjoyed the buffet especially my teenage grandchildren.

title: Beautiful experience
desc: The service was excellent, i would like to be in your hotel again, the rooms were neat and clean and were looked after in my absence with caution and care. Thank you Orchid Hotel management for having such a nice staff.

title: AC Spoil
desc: Aircon was not cold and i called tge reception. Aircon technician was here within mins. Aircon technician came and rectify. Aircon valve was turned off. He settled the ac within mins and was very helpful.

title: Pleasant stay
desc: I loved the room it was very clean and tidy.. beautifully kept by yen yen.. She not only cleaned the room properly but also kept my things at the correct place..I wanted to thank her as she always cleared my mess.. The swimming pool is big , the breakfast was a huge spread and also the hotel is near all the big malls as it's walkable from the famous orchard road.. I shall come back again.. Thank you

title: Well run & well located business hotel
desc: In overpriced Singapore hotel market, the Orchard Hotel represents good value. The room whilst smallish, is well laid out, has good aircon & lighting. I found the lobby layout a little untidy, but location is convenient being at top end of Orchard road. Service is efficient. A reliable & well run 4 star hotel. Recommended

title: Strategic location for stay
desc: Its strategic location since I have training at VOCO hotel. Just 2min walks. Nice hotel, clean & good ambient for stay. However, for breakfast ..its not really Muslim friendly even the kitchen is Halal certified. Quite disappointed with some of the chef responding. Hope they can improve on this.

title: 4 star hotel
desc: Includes nightclub , outdoor pool area , ballroom , dry cleaning , 24 hour service , about 650 luxury rooms. buffet breakfast is available daily. Offers fitness classes and gym area for guests. Enjoy pleasant stay

title: Great stay Deluxe Twin
desc: Nicely renovated room that was spacious and well ventilated. Lots of natural light from big window looking out to the streets. Breakfast had an amazing selection and was also entertaining with a robot serving eggs to one‚Äôs liking. Pool was really lovely. Only thing that was puzzling was that only mineral water was available and very pricey for a small bottle. Hotel should provide free water in such a hot country especially for kids at the pool. Overall, it was great. Super location and lots of good restaurants and shopping around the area.

title: Great
desc: Really enjoyed our stay in the orchard hotel. Breakfast was great and very efficiently run. We had a room with a free mini bar which was very welcome beer wine and soft drinks included. At the time we were there there was building work going on which we were told would not affect our stay, howevere because we stayed for 10 nights one morning we decided to have a little lay in which rudely disturbed by horrendous noise coming from the floor below, we asked to move rooms to a quieter room which was granted strait away. I would night recommend this hotel.

title: Above expectations
desc: Newly renovated, good facilities and excellebr fixtures, amazing stay. Probably best breakfast in town. Optimal place for business or leisure. Easy to get to places, excellent location and very friendly staff. Can t fault this place at all. Congrats Will be back ! Mourad Essafi

title: Unforgettable wedding experience!
desc: We had our wedding in Sep 2019 and we are glad to have met our wedding coordinator - Oliver Tey. He was helpful right from the initial planning process, he gave us advice and had also extended additional perks to us. We were blessed to be able to hold our wedding in the newly renovated ballroom - it was beautiful. We were fortunate that the other ballrooms were not occupied that night, so we were able to have the whole level to ourselves. Besides Oliver, special mention to the banquet manager (Saed/syed?) and his team as they provided great service to our guests. Also to the Chef and kitchen staff, our guests were very satisfied with the food that night. Last but not list, we had an enjoyable stay at the bridal suite with the arrangement made by guest experience manager - Chooi

title: Great location
desc: We loved this hotel, it‚Äôs in a perfect location on orchard road. The staff in the hotel were very friendly, especially when advising us on places to see and how to get here. From the hotel you can walk to the gardens and the hop on hop off bus stops just outside. If You love shopping this Is the place to be.

title: Wedding Banquet at Orchard Hotel
desc: We just had our wedding banquet at the orchard hotel. The hotel and ballroom have recently gone through a renovation which was a plus point. The ballroom is beautiful with no pillar and a high ceiling. Our wedding coordinator, Praba, was very responsive and helpful. She also accommodated most of our requests. She was very efficient on the wedding day and quick to provide solutions. We received good feedbacks on food from our guests too. Highly recommended our coordinator, Praba and orchard hotel!

title: Family Vacation
desc: Its our 2nd time stay as a couple and 1st time as a whole family of 11 members. It was a home away from experience. Location is excellent, staff are friendly, accomodating and effecient. The rooms are spaceous with great aminities. Front desk personels and restaurant crew are the most effecient when it came to our needs. Especial thanks to Ms Joanne Marie David.

title: Two night stay
desc: On arrival the hotel looked very nice , On checking in the receptionist said that he would upgrade us to a signature room on the 18th floor . When getting out of the elevator on the top floor it was very dark with black wallpaper down the corridor it‚Äôs just a personal opinion but for me the rooms were also very dark and the room that we had was really quite small dated and tired , needing renovation, although saying that the bathroom was very nice with a shower that also head small shower heads for your back etc . Breakfast was very good with a excellent choice for everyone.

title: An outstanding hotel
desc: I stayed here for two nights in October. Recently renovated, it's a modern, classy hotel. Staff are excellent: warm, friendly, full of knowledge. Food is of a very high standard. Breakfast and lunch buffet faultless with lots of good options. The Hua Ting Chinese restaurant is worth a visit - fine, gourmet food. Rooms are well-equipped with USBs, sockets, flat-screen TV. Bathroom spacious and deluxe. Big swimming pool too. If I'm ever in Singapore again, I'll be returning.

title: Overall good experience
desc: I stayed two nights with my husband and parents in October and we all had a good time. We especially appreciated Tina Soh‚Äôs cheerful hospitality in the restaurant, where we had breakfast twice. Definitely recommend.

Which did not help when you had people with many queries. Finally we got to a staff person. He looked and looked and looked for a room, remember this was after 4pm, and finally said a room was not ready. I challenged him in

title: Excellent stay, I recommend !
desc: I stayed for a week in Singapore, and I can tell you there is an oustanding service, the hotel is well located, and the business lounge is a perfect place to rest and have a drink. Don't hesitate to book here!

title: Wedding Dinner At Orchard Hotel Singapore
desc: We had our wedding dinner at Orchard Hotel Singapore. Special thanks to Praba, our coordinator, and her team for ensuring that everything went smoothly that day. Praba was responsive and attentive to our requests and needs. From banquet arrangement, to decor and bridal stay, everything was well taken care off. Food was good with many praises from our guests too! Thank you for being part of our big day! Ps. It would be great if we can have our extra night stay to be used on our anniversary instead of just within the 3 months validity period.

title: Singapore Holiday
desc: Very nice hotel. Booked a club room with access to the Premier Lounge. Staff was great. Tried the breakfast at the Premier Lounge and the lobby restaurant. Both were great. Also hit the happy hour at the Premier Lounge. Staff was great, friendly, quick service.

title: Brilliant Hotel
desc: We stayed in Singapore for just a few days and this hotel was fab. Great location, good amenities and staff were extremely helpful. Room was lovely and breakfast was boss!Would definitely stay here again.

title: '' Nice room''
desc: I got room on corner as i requsted since booked far from elevator.room very modern ,big room if compare to other city hotel in singapur. Breakfast staff welcoming and friendly too.only spraying line in our room need to change.

title: Very nice stay
desc: Central location and clean hotel. The staff are helpful and friendly. staff in the executive lounge have been outstanding, Joanna and Debra. They have gone over and above my expectations in hospitality. I have travelled the world and have not come across such genuine staff who really care for their guests. They are an asset to the hotel and undoubtedly a testament to the hotel leadership. Dr Mahir Hamad Middlesbrough UK

title: Our Perfect Wedding - 27 October 2019
desc: Thank you for being a big part of our wedding, Orchard Hotel. From the beautiful ballroom setup, to the yummy food from Hua Ting, and of cos Praba our coordinator. Praba and her team were very professional and patient with us, giving very detailed advices. We had a really smooth and fun wedding ceremony! Thank you again, Praba and team! :)

title: Outstanding Service
desc: My wife and I spent a week Singapore for our anniversary and this hotel delivered! We purchased the Premier Lounge access and it exceeded our expectations. Daisy, Shahar and the rest of the team were fantastic and made us feel welcome. On our anniversary night we returned to our room and waiting for us was a bottle of red wine and cake. The staff had very good knowledge in where the best shopping was located and local area attractions. Overall outstanding service, friendly staff and a great location with easy access to shopping, restaurants and public transport. Thank you guys for making our stay a memorable one.

title: Simply the Best!
desc: What a super hotel to arrive at after 13 hours Imane airplane! The 17th floor is the place where there‚Äôs the Premier Lounge where among others is Daisy Thomas. If the Lounge is the recuperation clinic, then Daisy is the matron who dispenses healing concoctions! Head there to think what a good move you made by choosing The Orchard Hotel.

title: Excellent stay
desc: Great hotel, at the quieter end of Orchard Road. Well appointed rooms, which are large and comfortable. The beds and bedding are very comfortable The breakfast buffet was huge, the staff were friendly and helpful.

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: Clean, comfortable and the swimming pool was lovely. Right in the heart of Orchard Roadm lots to do.The concierge Rashid, went way over the top to help me book my return airplane seats. /thank you Rashid. I would recommend this hotel in an instant.

title: Excellent hotel
desc: We arrived at the hotel earlier about 3hours. The hotel staff quickly arranged for us to stay at the hotel. The room was very comfortable and we were very happy. The hotel is located at the heart of Singapore.

title: Excellent service!!
desc: We had a great time staying at orchard hotel. The room was clean and comfortable. The service was excellent. We stayed to celebrate my husband birthday and they sent a delicious chocolate cake to our room. The manager said she bought it herself, very thoughtful of her!! Unfortunately we forgot to asked the reception‚Äôs and manager‚Äôs name because we were in a hurry catching a taxi to the airport. Overall we highly recommended this hotel. Thank you for your warm hospitality!!

title: Great stay at the Orchard Hotel

The staff were under a lot of pressure to get everyone in as soon as possible to clear the reception area and they were brilliant! Very professional, efficient and good humoured. The manager Jean-Phillipe was also helping and was very apologetic for the delay. We had a lovely chat with him about the rugby World Cup and where to watch it. We had afternoon tea there but were out at the time of the drinks although we did call in for soft drinks on our return in

Another surprise came when we were told that we

title: Unforgettable Experience At Orchard Hotel, Singapore
desc: Our great appreciation to the Club Lounge Staffs on their impeccable services rendered during our sojourn at your prestigious hotel. Thank you Ms. Daisy, Sara, Rita and Debra , likewise Mr. Shahar and Cedric. Our very best regards, Allen Chan and Jenny Tang

title: Orchard Hotel
desc: Stayed here for a night. Beautiful hotel with a spacious room. Comfortable bed. Nice spread of breakfast in the morning. Despite the queue, i was ushered to a table within less than 10 minutes. Million thanks to the reception staff name Kent for the complimentary upgrade. Will definitely comeback to this hotel again
