desc: We stayed here for a combined business and vacation. The lounge is a great place to unwind after work or to go after the gym and pool. Also, good place to get breakfast rather than the busy hotel restaurant. The staff are very friendly and attentive

title: Continues to deliver and improve
desc: I have reviewed this hotel previously but just wanted to say that the quality of service received from the club level staff continues to be exemplary. They are courteous, friendly and very helpful, Sara, Daisy and the whole team are excellent, thank you for making my visits to the Orchard Hotel a pleasure every time

title: great experience need to share :)
desc: welcoming staff while Check in proccess. staff with tag name ‚ÄúAeriz‚Äù explain our reservation and tell us about our need very detail . as we are trip with family which is extra needed during stay. the room is great and big enough for our family and the location is perfect for Tourist . thank you for your great experience. regards ima

title: Holiday
desc: We arrived at SG and checked in around 4.30 PM. Their reception was quiet fast for our checked in. Especially we want to thanks Ms. Yen that already provide our room so special and they put cake inside our room. And Ms. Yen visited us in our room to welcoming us to Orchard Hotel. Their breakfast was an international buffet b'fast. Nice hotel and recommended.

title: Good Service
desc: My wife and I greatly apprecia te the best services given by all the staff of The Orchard Cafe specially Ms Tina Soh whenever we visit your cafe for meals. Food are all awesome. Thanks a million for the hospitality of the team. Lynn Tryon (mobile:93807992)

title: Singapore Orchard Hotel Stay
desc: Our first time in Singapore and our stay at the Orchard Singapore did not disappoint. We upgraded to a club room. The service from Daisy and the team was first class. So friendly and welcoming. Nothing was too much trouble. Breakfast in the relaxing environment was so worth it. Debra made sure our choice of eggs arrived with a smile. The chef and team obviously very proud of their service took time to meet guests too. The selection for afternoon tea and cocktails was welcome after spending time around such a beautiful city. Daisy was able to recommend some great activities and places to go. Her knowledge of the city second to none and obviously very proud to work for the hotel. The team even acknowledged my birthday with a special surprise in my room on return from an

title: Average
desc: We were returning guests of the Orchard Hotel and have to say this time around our stay was below average. Although I had reconfirmed our booking with front office via email before staying there was a mix up with our booking and the front desk took considerable time in locating the booking and then further mixing up booking of the room and breakfast. The front desk are incredibly slow with check out and check in . Worst of our trip so far and not what you would expect for a 5 star hotel. Additionally the key to the room did not work. We have been travelling for 6 weeks all five star hotels around Asia and this has been the worst. Have stayed in Singapore plenty of times and having stayed at the Fullerton, Marriott, The Regent, Royal plaza on Scott‚Äôs, and the Orchard previously

title: Weekend Stay
desc: Very friendly People welcome me at Orchard Hotel. Actually I stayed at the Premium Lounge and it was always Relaxing. The Location is good and you can do a lot of things in Walking distance. Orchard...

title: Hua Ting Restaurant/Ballrooms
desc: Top notch restaurant at Orchard Hotel Hua Ting. I had a business lunch with Mr Aston Chan, Ms Choi Chin Chin, Ms Haze Yong. The food is incredible and the quality is superb. I highly recommend those who wish to have a quiet, quality food, ambience, this is the best Orchard Hotel Restaurant you should consider. Mr Aston Chan who is in charge of guest rooms was very professional and with the rooms showing with newly renovated was at top notch room i ever seen. Ms Choi and Ms Yong - Catering was very accommodating to our business clients every bi monthly meetings. The food Orchard Hotel provided are fresh, superb quality food. Highly recommend Orchard Hotel having events/wedding/conferences. You must take a look at the ballroom, they are very classic and glamours. Well done

title: Nice and quiet
desc: room is superclean. very nice view and had a very peaceful sleep. location wise was not bad and it took 20 minutes to go takashimaya. nonetheless it was a good walk as it passes several good shopping areas. staffs are great and helpful. probably great if halal food is serve.

title: Business and hollydays.
desc: Have used this hotel for many years. Good location and very close to Orchard road. Excellent service at the hotel and club lounge. In this Orchard road you will find everything. Shopping and resturants around every corner. Also close to Singapore Botanic Garden. Few minutes with taxi to other locations.

title: ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION
desc: We celebrated our 2nd year wedding anniversary as our wedding was held there two years back. The front office manager did the check in for us, he was very pleasant and polite, offered us a complimentary upgrade to their signature suite, along with their guest service manager Chin Chooi Yen who escort us up to the room with a smile on her face while making small talk along the way. She asked what time should they deliver the complimentary cake and fruits amenities up, i told her 9pm. We are so glad to make the right choice here as their service is impeccable and sincere. The room was spacious and nicely decorated. Later at 9pm, the cake and fruits was delivered by her as well. Simple act like this makes our day and goes a long way. Thanks so much for making our wedding

title: Top notch for the Orchard Road area
desc: All good and great value for location, ambience, room quality and food and bar options. Monster breakfast selection means you can skip your lunch once venturing from the hotel. I will return as habit.

title: Fantastic Hotel - Loved the Club Lounge
desc: We stayed three nights prior to our cruise. We booked a Club Room direct from the hotel - it was worth every dollar. The room was spacious and included mini bar in the room (it wasn‚Äôt replenished in our stay), club lounge access all day - breakfast was amazing (loved eggs Benedict), afternoon tea was great and canap√©s and alcohol at night gave us no need to search for dinner. We also celebrated our 35th wedding anniversary and the hotel provided us with a beautiful cake. We did try breakfast downstairs but soon decided that the club lounge offered more intimate atmosphere. Being in a Club room also entitled us to two pieces of laundry per day - picked up in the morning and returned in the afternoon. We only discovered how this worked on the last day. Overall, a great hotel in a

title: Good experience as always
desc: Great food and ambience and cleanliness. Commend Tina, Effendi and Peggy for good service,hard work and friendly. Nonya kueh today is good...usually it is dry and not good quality. Today it's moist and greater variety.

title: Located well but rest was crap pure
desc: By early arrival we asked for early check-in. Got this offered for 100$ (4hrs earlier). But we had to wait and come back all 30' to ask if ready. Meanwhile we drunk a coffee/cappucino. Though we were hotel guest, listed for an expensive early check-in, we had to pay 22$ for 2 beverages. After 2.5hrs of waiting we gave up. Room cleanliness was horrible. Our toothbrush-glases had a cm thick layer of old toothpaste. Mentioned 3 times.....no change happend. Rest of cleanliness on same level. The breakfast venue reminds me to a cantina (bright, ice cold AC, a bustle like x-mas shopping on NY 5th avenue. And a deluxe room that offers a very small queensize bed isn't also not state of the art anymore. 4 hangers in closet for 2 people, also very poor dimensioned. Almost every drawer of

title: Love the Durian Pengat!
desc: Great food and service. Convenient location. The hotel is newly renovated and everything looks fresh and new. Great ambience for dining with your friends/family/colleagues. Will definitely come back again.

title: Splendid service and prompt lost & found follow-up
desc: Kudos to Sekaran, Security manager and Sanal, Assistant Banquet Operations manager who helped in the recovery of an item left behind from a conference held yesterday. Hotel staff went the extra mile to check the CCTV and trace the missing item to the event organiser. Recovered the item and handed to me this afternoon. Delighted by their continuous status updates. Orchard Hotel is a trustworthy hotel for conference delegates.

title: Superb service at breakdast
desc: Despite the breakfast room being very busy and somewhat crowded, the choice is excellent and the service exceptional - in particular thanks to the very friendly, wonderfully caring and very efficient staff- foremost Ms. Tina Soh. She made the special difference and gave us superb service. Thank you! We will come back.

title: Fabulous
desc: Booked at last minute. Got a club room which included 14th floor privileges of breakfast, afternoon tea and pre-dinner drinks with canapes. Room was beautiful, situated on orchard road and staff were really helpful. We were offered 3pm check out as we had a late flight. Would definitely stay again.

title: The service is good.
desc: The staff were very warm and helpful. Though this hotel has been in Singapore for many years, it has renovated. The hotel is very popular and therefore do expect a lot of guests queueing for check in, check out and breakfast at Level 1. But the staff were very helpful and systematic to help to clear the queue.

title: Amazing Stay - Exquisite Service
desc: Where do I start.....Orchard Hotel...truly service from the heart...from the moment you check in ....to the suite (one of a kind...cosy..spacious...inviting)...to the club lounge...where anything and everything that you want and need at your fingertips....to the service, Special mention and thanks to Joanna (Duty Manager/Club Lounge Manager), Sharhar (Assistant Manager) and Sara (Club Lounge Team). Their service is world class and top range. The moment you walk into the lounge you are greeted by your name....hugs...gorgeous smiles....and just a coming home feeling. Sharhar knows all your needs and wants....long black..pouched eggs...etc. You are served just as you are in a friend's home. He always has a welcoming and handsome smile. Sara ....what can i say...just a very

title: Quality food
desc: + It offers a wide range of quality food for steamboat lovers. There is both set and a la carte menu ranging from fresh seafood to snack items. + Reception staff was able to give clear instructions and communicate well with their customers

title: Not what you would expect!
desc: This hotel is old and nothing special service is poor, they returned the laundry without washing it, never seen that! I gave a two instead of one just thanks to the breakfast, which is nice electricity comes and goes there are no power outlets close to the bed the pool is outside

title: Cozy hotel, friendly staff
desc: They provided complimentary room to refresh after check out is really nice because my flight is at 9.00 pm and I have to check out at 12.00 am. And the breakfast also good, but they dont inform us which one is halal and which one is not. So we have to guess by our self

title: Returning to UK
desc: Super friendly staff - particularly Aeriz and Amanda. Keen to offer advice and ideas. Marvellous breakfast WITH omelette robot! Great access to Orchard Road and the essential Newton Circus Food Centre.

title: an amazing experience
desc: Everything is clean and organized, Amanda at the front desk was very helpful and friendly. great location, many shops and nice restaurants around. Is a beautiful design, the pool is perfect for swimming during the morning or at night time.

title: Great stay at Singapore
desc: Stayed in hotel for 3 nights. Had a great stay and amazing time in Singapore . The hotel staff goes an extra mile to make your stay comfortable and your experience better. I would specially like to thank Siew Mei who just help me in every way possible. Rooms are good. All the services are available at your doorstep. Location is at the heart of Singapore. You cannot ask for more.

title: Good location
desc: Nice hotel, clean and The location is very convenience . Many shops, malls, and restaurants within walking distance and Metro station within 10 minutes walk. The staff are friendly, Special Thanks to Mr. Aeriz in frontdesk.

title: Family friendly hotel
desc: I stayed at orchard Hotel from Tuesday to Friday this November 2019. I booked a family room which was very spacious, 1 king sized bed and 2 single beds. The bathroom had a bathtub and shower. There was a small refrigerator, coffee and tea. Although it's not very new it was clean and the staff were very attentive and accommodating. At the front desk (concierge) Nelson Wang and Kent were very helpful. We were also able to access the Premier Club, where you can have breakfast, tea and evening cocktails for free. The manager at the Premier Club, Ms Joanna David was also very friendly and helpful. We got a buffet breakfast which had an interesting automated robot that cooked eggs and omelet. Coffee was also good. At first I thought that the hotel location was too far from the middle

title: Good rooms, service and excellent breakfast!
desc: Had a wonderful stay at the hotel. My colleague got a more traditional room in different wing, while I got the modern one. Both of us liked ours. Everything was good, so cannot complain. Breakfast was quite good but slight variations daily. Room was spacious, well maintained however not so sound-proof. I could hear sounds from lobby and next door the whole time.

title: Good Hotel
desc: It's my home hotel where staffs are taking good care of me in all aspects. The premier lounge service is excellent. The rooms are very spacious. The room rate is very reasonable, value for money. The Chinese restaurant also serving very delicious vegetarian food. Always my good choice!

title: I like the club lounge and location of the property
desc: My family and me have been patronizing the Orchard hotel for over 13 years now. Whenever we are in Singapore we always stay at the Orchard. As the flight gets in really early, most of the time we do request an early check in and 9 out of 10 times do get it too. But the best part of our stay is the club lounge which is very comfortable and welcoming due to your staff Sara and Daisy. They make sure that a cup of tea is nicer as it is made exactly the way one likes it. I have been interacting with both of them for many years now and I think they are both worth 3 Michelin stars!

title: A wonderful stay !!!!
desc: I booked the Signature suite for 6 nights from 06 to 12/Nov and the room and service did not disappoint.Having been travelling for 14 hours from London, I was checked in without any delay. Complementary fruit bowl on arrival and a host of benefits e.g. laundry and dry cleaning etc,etc,etc,etc 2 exceptional staff members I must complement are Sara and Daisy from the Executive Lounge for looked after me and my guest with the up most warmth, professionalism, They epitomize the highest standard of hospitality. A great asset to Orchard Hotel Singapore. Will be back in Singapore in June 2020 and will definitely book this hotel. Once again my sincere thanks to Sara, Daisy and not forgetting Rita who also works at the Executive Lounge.

title: A must recommend Hotel
desc: Staff are so nice and hospitable. Easily approach. Food are good. Rooms are clean and relaxing. Accessible to malls or any stores. Peaceful ambience of the Hotel. Overall it is worth for 5 star. Definitely if we will be back in Singapore we will stay again here.

title: It's ok
desc: This hotel located at the start of Orchard Road and not far from eating places and bus station however must walk a bit to Orchard station MRT. The twin bed is not 120 cm wide so a bit difficult to use if you bring a child and want to sleep together. The room was quite big though. Too bad it's a full carpet one. The breakfast was ok, has a varieties of food. There's a small eating place in the same building with the hotel aas well. For those will bring children, has religious concern and might easily get offended, you might want to avoid this place as across it there are night clubs and adult shops. On the weekend sometimes you can hear people shouting and quite a lot of women (at least I think they are women) with a lot of skin exposed. Just bring yourself nicely to other area.

title: Excellent Hotel for Meetings/ Conferences
desc: Love the service provided by Senior Catering Sales Manager, Mr Thomson Tsen for his professionalism, always can-do attitude and flexibility. He understands the client's needs really well. Rest assured everything will be well-taken care of under his supervision. Must not forget the banquet team especially Mr Nicholas and Mdm Shanti always making sure all events are run smoothly on the day itself. Kudos team and job well done. In fact, our company has planned our one year events with Orchard Hotel. Please look up for Mr Tsen for all meeting packages.

title: Ok but nothing special
desc: This was a family holiday with 6 adults 3 rooms for New Year‚Äôs Eve. On arrival we were greeted by bag man who was prompt at getting our gear into the lobby. When we got to the checkin counter things started to go pear shape as our rooms were not ready. The staff could not give us any timeframe as to when they might be ready. We were given a voucher for one free drink each, after one hour I checked with the desk again with no result. I asked if they would be able to continue to supply some more drinks as it was 2 hours past checkin time. We finally got our room at 18:20 as you could imagine after being up for over 14 hours we were getting annoyed. Having gotten past the first night the rest of the stay was ok. The breakfast was good, rooms were clean and comfortable. There was

title: Exceptional Wedding Venue
desc: My wife and I had our wedding lunch here last year and it was a splendid experience. Everything from the wedding planning (Praba - our wedding coordinator) and coordination of the actual day event (Cynthia - our banquet manager) went really smooth with no hiccups. The food from Hua Ting was also great and was complimented greatly by my wedding guests. The only downside I would say is that payment for the wedding banquet need not be so rushed. After all, the guests would be staying at the hotel and could easily be done at the bridal suite. It was disappointing when my guests actually noticed the hotel staff waiting at the door to collect payment. Even if need be, he should have stayed out of sight until all of my guests had left.

title: Lovely stay in a lovely city
desc: My hubby and I stayed here for three nights. The start of a longer holiday but ample to see this lovely city. Orchard is a very busy hotel. The service is impeccable. The room we stayed in was cosy (as you‚Äôd expect in a city hotel) but well appointed, very comfy (although we were next to the left shaft which was a little noisy - not that the snoring husband noticed!). Avoid breakfast over a long weekend any time after 9am as it‚Äôs rammed in the dining room and when you‚Äôre hungry, waiting in a queue to be seated can turn you to hangry!

title: Very good club lounge service
desc: We Stayed there during the new year. Very good service team at club lounge led by Mr Shahar. Must not miss this club lounge if you are staying here. We highly recommend to visit this hotel and check out this club lounge

title: David great service
desc: Came to Hua Ting for New Year‚Äôs Eve dinner with my family and David service for the night was fantastic. Enthusiast, professional and cheerful young man! High praise for the staff as it made the dinner an even better experience than it already was.

title: Eventful Year End Party & Great Accommodation
desc: An eventful Year End Party and Great Accommodation which staff and colleagues enjoyed. It‚Äôs about merry making during the festive season and I, also had a great accommodation. It was made possible by following staff who were friendly, helpful and served with passion and smiles. Certainly an asset to the Organisation. Guest Experience : Chooi Yen and Delilah Club Lounge : Joana, Shahar, Sara, Daisy, Zoey, Sonia and Chef in lounge Banquet : Kevin and Mun Keat I am sure that I will be back for another great accommodation.

title: Great experience at Orchard Hotel for Christmas!
desc: My sister and I checked in for our annual staycation at Orchard Hotel over the christmas! The check in was fast and we were greeted by the experience manageress and she surprised us with gift in our room!!! Was pleasantly surprised by this welcome gift! We had the club facilites and every time we went there we were greeted by the friendly staff, Daisy, Shahar, Sonia and Zoe. Their services were excellent. Especially Daisy, she will make us comfortable and make sure all our needs are being met. We look forward to dine there as we feel very at home. Kudos to all the staff! We will come back again every year and recommend all our friends locally and overseas about this great and affordable hotel! Ms Tan

title: We had an excellent stay!!
desc: From checking in to house keeping all the staff are extremely friendly and helpful. Thank you Ms. Yen and to your colleagues!! Ms, Joana Marie, Ms Sara and the rest of the club lounge staff!! See you guys again in few months üòä

title: Great stay
desc: We stayed here for two nights prior to setting off on a cruise round the Far East. Upgraded to executive room with lounge access. Actually stayed here in May 18 but TA won‚Äôt let us go back that far. Lounge was a wonderful place to relax in the afternoon. Room was great, staff were exceptional and great location on Orchard Road.

title: Pleasant and enjoyable family staycation at Orchard Hotel
desc: First time stay at Orchard Hotel, two Premier rooms (connecting King to Twin). Fifth floor, Claymore Wing. Weekday. Purpose: wedding anniversary & family staycation. Greeted by Kenta upon check-in. Later, we unexpectedly found, in the room, a lovely cake in a nice box along with napkins and utensils plus a thoughtful card - many thanks, Kenta and the Guest Experience Team! Thank you Mico for the special arrangement of club access! It was one of the highlights for my family. Premier Lounge was very nice indeed. My family really had a memorable experience! Thank you Daisy, Debra and team! We sure were well tended to, but not overly. Orchard Cafe buffet breakfast was also well liked by the family. Keep it up! Large and comfortable to use umbrellas could be borrowed at

title: Great stay, fantastic service
desc: Had a great end of year stay. Room was clean, large and well decorated. Comfortable bed with fluffy pillows and a comforter that made you just want to stay in bed all day. Service was great, and made better by Joanna! Will be back.

title: Social Night Event
desc: A big thank you to Orchard Hotel Singapore for hosting our Social Night Dinner 2019! Great team, great service, great food! Special mention goes to Priscilla (Catering), Zong Heng and team (Banquet) and Chef David and team üëçüëç

title: Great food, excellent service!
desc: First time revisiting Orchard Cafe after many years and the food certainly did not disappoint! There is a wide variety of Asian and International dishes, all of which are executed very well. Even though it might be against the rules of buffet-eating, you'll definitely want to try the Briyani rice and the laksa from the live station. Both of these carb dishes are extremely savoury and satisfying!

title: Comfortable stay
desc: Two night stay, older hotel in good condition and location. Rooms not new but generous in size, clean and comfortable. Large windows, good natural light in the room, view just of other nearby buildings, 150 meters or so away. Interior lighting at night was adequate but not my preference. Lamps with low watt bulbs. No ceiling lights. I prefer option to have the room more brightly lit. Bathroom, good size with shower and small tub. Cloth for washing provided and soap bar of adequate size. Bathroom lighting okbut not great. Gym had 3 eliptical and 4 or 5 treadmills. Couple of benches and free weights. Rather cramped area. View from pool is good as it looks out onto pool area. Restaurant on the ground floor offers both a buffet at lunch and menu to order from. Buffet was great and

title: Manoj kumarNair
desc: Very nice hotel and location.comfortable stay. Good experience. Good breakfast. Overall nice experience. Lot of shopping centres on orchard road.outside food courts are near to hotel. Overall good experience.

title: Orchard hotel
desc: Spacious room, friendly staff and good location. First time staying at this hotel, very good first impression. Hotel staff very helpful and with smile makes my stay very welcomed. Will be back here again for sure. Thank Shafiq for friendly service

title: Very good food. Sophia is awesome.
desc: Had dinner with friends and highly recommend the following dishes: - roast duck - very tasty, tender and juicy - pork ribs with bak kut teh soup - pork ribs was yummy. Soup was tasty. - emperor chicken - meeswa with live prawn and Chinese wine (big portion) Sophia Jin was very helpful.

title: A DISASTER IN SINGAPORE
desc: We arrived last night, booking was done 3 months ago for 03 rooms. It took more than 45mn to find our reservation...GOD...and 1 or the room not ready at 5pm....receptionist was below average, polite and totally incompetent...my daughter called engineering at 8pm as one plug not working...they came at 1am...GOD....breakfast was good but queue was 30mn...GOD.... Somewhere, location is good, rooms are quite nice even small but renovated. POOR management, I feel bad for all customers, expensive hotel without any service. A good lesson for me, better pay a bit more and stay Sheraton, Hilton, Accor or any,,,

title: waiting for our cruise
desc: Excellent welcome and this morning more items for breakfast than I have ever seen. Tables cleaned quickly and food refreshed often. Our Room is spacious and clean, this hotel is in the middle of where you want to be, but the rooms are blissfully quiet. would 100% recommend

title: Great service and comfort
desc: My girlfriend and I had a staycation where we greatly enjoyed the conscientious service and comfortable room. Club access was great with a wide variety of bites and drinks, and the breakfast buffet was delicious. Would definitely recommend for couples looking for a quick getaway.

title: Fantastic - service, food and great location
desc: I confess I‚Äôm not always easy to please but have to say from entering the doors to exiting this visit has been delightful. We upgraded to a suite and worth EVERY penny. The room was amazing, decor oriental and made us feel like we were on holiday rather than the usual business decor. The premium longe was a most welcome benefit where we dined for complimentary breakfast and afternoon tea where the staff were so attentive and welcoming (special thanks to Joanne and Muhd). Really can‚Äôt recommend this hotel more.

title: Old Hotel, can be better
desc: Stayed 2 nights at Orchard hotel to celebrate a special occasion, and there‚Äôs a complaint for almost every aspect of our stay. First, the signature room that we paid more for was eerie, to say the least. The hotel opted to have very Oriental decorations for the signature rooms which are priced higher. And unless you are a fan of Oriental antiquities and dark rooms, stay clear of these rooms. The decor made my hair stand, it‚Äôs a perfect setting for a horror movie. The Hotel claim to have refurbished their rooms, yet the signature rooms were old and outdated with small, dark bathrooms and no bath tubs. Only parts of the hotel have been refurbished, and whatever they could salvage, remain, which didn‚Äôt do much for the facelift of the hotel. You can clearly see old bathtubs,

title: Efficient hotel
desc: The last time I visited was 26 years ago and not a lot has changed. The hotel has maintained its standards. The staff were helpful throughout our 9-day stay. We were able to checkin early at 10am even though they did warn us over the phone it depends on availability. There are no warm welcomes or goodbyes here, and it is jarring to those unaccustomed to Singapore. Everything is business-like, so don‚Äôt be put off. The breakfast spread was good, but it was the exact same over the 9 days we were there. The Indian food is really disappointing, but overall we were satisfied. We were traveling with a 2.5-year old. If you are late for breakfast expect a 10-15 wait on weekends. The hotel is connected to a mall of sorts so there are other food options. Orchard Road is full of places

title: Lovely hotel.
desc: We stayed for four nights prior to flying on to Auckland NZ and during the Chinese New Year celebrations. Situated at the top of Orchard Road the hotel is very convenient for all the restaurants and shopping malls on Orchard Road. Very convenient for the Botanical Gardens. The hop on hop off buses stop just outside the hotel as do the regular services. The underground is a short walk away. Our room was very comfortable with a small bath and walk-in shower and the breakfast had more variety than we've seen in many hotels - something for all tastes. Staff are very polite and helpful. There is a supermarket just around the corner inside the Claymore Connect, very useful for bottled water et cetera. The only issue we encountered was the lack of seating in reception whilst waiting

title: Excellent location
desc: A good hotel in an excellent location. Although some distance from central Singapore it is well positioned for transport connections, quality shopping and restaurants. Parking available underground. The 'Big Bus' hop on / hop off stops right outside so very convenient for tourists. This modern hotel is well presented even providing a door-man to welcome you. A large lobby with a coffee lounge, bar and restaurant welcome you with direct, under cover, access to a small shopping area. Large clean rooms with international tv stations but, surprisingly, no BBC channel.

title: 3rd Happy stay here
desc: I stayed at the Orchard Hotel for 3 nights early in January on my way home from holiday. It‚Äôs a great location, an easy and short walk to all the great stores on Orchard Road. This was my 3rd stay at the Orchard at this time of year and I would stay here again. I always pick a Club room, which gives club Lounge Access and is great for late check out. Sara and Muhd in the club lounge were especially helpful and welcoming, always knowing my name and favorite drink. They were very attentive and kind. The food and drinks at evening drinks is great; always varied, tasty and plentiful. I really enjoyed my stay again - thank you!

title: 2 day break on way to cruise the Indian ocean
desc: Very cosmopolitan friendly Hotel .Excellent area for site seeing .rearly liked this hotel has pool & many extras .We recamend this would loved to have stayed longer. Food for all tastes super service .

title: A pleasant stay at the beginning of our holiday.
desc: We arrived in the evening and checked in. We had a car from Changi airport and the driver and hotel staff were helpful with the luggage. We liked our room. There was adequate storage and a good bathroom. The view was not exceptional. We were hungry after our long flight and wanted a light meal. We chose to go to the upstairs restaurant and service was very slow. The drinks had to come from the bar downstairs. We got our meals but they were a little dry and unappetising. We had breakfast and dinner each evening. The choice at breakfast is mind-boggling. We chose the downstairs restaurant for dinner on subsequent evenings and opted for the a la carte menu. This was very good; substantial portions and a good choice. We were at the hotel when the Chinese New Year was coming

title: Friendly hotel but crouwdy
desc: We stayed here for New Years Evening. A very friendly staff. Clean rooms and great beds. Only it is a really full hotel. The breakfast is good but you have to stand every moment into a line to be served. Also the walls of the rooms are thin so a lot of noises came at night into you room.

title: Great wedding experience
desc: We did not regret choosing Orchard Hotel to hold our wedding lunch banquet on 120120. The catering sales team were very professional and pleasant to work with. We were very fortunate to have Prabavathy to be our main coordinator as she was extremely helpful and friendly throughout our wedding journey. The hotel rooms were clean and comfy, the ballroom was elegant and well lit and most importantly the food served during the lunch banquet were fantastic. We are very blessed to have Praba as our wedding coordinator at Orchard hotel and also a big thank you to Oliver for the assistance provided when Praba was not available. All in all we had a great experience there.

title: awesome service
desc: friendly staff, fast check in. the rooms are clean and fresh. the location is faNTASTIC. The executive lounge for cocktail and breakfast is small but adequate with knowledeable staff. An adorable visit. surely will book again.

title: A Hidden Gem in Orchard üíï
desc: Had a wonderful stay at the Orchard Hotel for the CNY break. Pleasant ambience, impeccable hospitality and wonderful experience all around. Shahar, Sara, Zoe and Kenta (from the Premier Club Lounge) were very friendly during our entire stay. Meeting them felt like catching up with an old friend - and a very good friend no less! Would definitely come back again and recommend others to stay at the Orchard Hotel. Definitely one to remember.

title: Lovely Stay
desc: Just spent 2 nights here. Very friendly staff, especially Zed. All very helpful with places to visit and directions. Made our stay enjoyable and memorable. To still have WiFi while waiting for transfer would have been a bonus.

title: Problem with safe in room
desc: We had a problem with the safe not locking so ella from security came and tried to fix it and then she called deane from engineering and they decided to replace the whole unit this all took less than 30 minutes from our first call to the information desk very professional thank you so much Deane and ella

title: Excellent service orchard hotel Singapore staff
desc: Orchard hotel in orchard road Singapore is conveniently located with access to underground trains, busses and regions within walking distance. The breakfast spread is kingly. The club and facilities are convenient . But what enhances all is the excellent service rendered by the staff at every level from the concierge to laundry collection, room attendant to waiters, expeditious check in and out to managers. Hats off to the professional yet humane approach and the right attitude of all we encountered. The chef at the egg station should not be replaced by the robot as the handmade omelettes taste so much better.

title: This is a "Best in Class" hotel in a great location in Singapore.
desc: Despite the virus this hotel made sure our stay was a happy and healthy one. All precautions were taken upon check-in. The staff was courteous and professional at all times. They made sure our needs were met at every step of the way. A shout out goes to Chooi Yen for excellent service and a memorable stay. The Orchard Hotel was in a great and convenient location. It was walking distance to all the malls, grocery stores and restaurants. In fact, the bus stop was right around the corner! The metro was just a couple blocks away.

title: great stay
desc: stayed in this property in feb 2020. very sophisticated and charming. the location is fantastic, right on the orchard street which is the heart of Singapore. the rooms are done nicely and the service is great. the highlight of our stay was the robotic services where literally the robots are at your room service, saving bottles of water and also making eggs at the breakfast buffet. the breakfast spread could be improved but would love to be there again.

title: One of the Best Hotelling Experiences I have had
desc: We had a really awesome stay at The Orchard Hotel in Singapore which is convenietly located just off the Orchard Road - the shopping district of Singapore. We had originally booked for a Grand Deluxe Room which was upgraded to a Signature Deluxe Room located on the 15th Floor, as we had requested for a room on a higher floor. We had requested for a queen bed instead of joining twin beds and this was also met without any issues. The room was quite spacious with a pretty good view of the surrounding buildings and had cabinets to store our luggage and other stuff, a mandatory safe (locked with a numeric code) to keep precious and important stuff, and a writing table besides the bed with drawers to store stuff - in short a lot of space to keep our stuff which you dont normally find

title: First time in Singapore
desc: On arrival we were greeted in a very friendly & professional way. Hotel is well situated & we made full use of 3 day tourist card on the MRT. All staff were polite & helpful in particular Azrul & Calene

title: Mr
desc: I have been in this hotel several times in my business trip to Singapore, this time the region have been hit with Covid19 Even though of the situation , the Orchard Hotel keep the high standards that it represent , high precautions for the safe of its guests , service , food and life band music at the bar , Most importantly is the smile and willingness of the staff to serve you as needed, keep it up guys well done I give five stars plus plus , specially to Mrs Yen Chooi for her great dedication to the customers

title: Great Place to stay
desc: We had a great time in Singapore. The Hotel location is perfect. Staff goes above and beyond to make you feel welcome. Great Breakfast Buffet whit a huge variety. The Rooms are clean and quiet. Big King-bed with comfortable Mattress. Definitely recommend it.

title: Birthday celebration
desc: Location of the hotel was ideal for easy shopping and food hunting experience. Easy access by all modes of transportation.The service was good. The cake to surprise our son was to our liking. My child loved the bunnies and elephant decoration placed in the room. There was also prayer direction for us muslims pasted in the hotel room. It would be better if the kitchen is halal certified. Overall, we are satisfies with our staycation there. Will definitely recommend to families and friends. Thank you, Orchard Hotel. Regards Maulana & Familia..

title: Great place in the city
desc: Stayed here with my husband for 2 nights. Perfect for shopping or just sightseeing. Bus stop just outside the bar entrance of the hotel. We asked for a quiet room with a view and we got it. Lovely room overlooking the entrance. Nicely decorated, very clean, comfy bed with crisp white sheets, fluffy pillows too. All amenities you would expect in the room, very modern bathroom with a walk in rain shower. Restaurant for the buffet was superb with a vast selection of different hot and cold food. Very attentive staff and very friendly, always offering advice. There was a choice of other restaurants within the hotel too. Reception staff were excellent, very professional but friendly with it and made us feel very welcome. Shame we had a flight to catch or we would have

title: Perfect Location in Singapore
desc: Stayed for 3 nights pre cruise at this hotel and it was perfect location for getting around Singapore. Hotel itself was very clean with extremely friendly staff . Rooms were large enough with nice bathrooms. Facilities included a lovely secluded swimming pool with loungers and towels. Its near the top of Orchard Rd so head left down the street to get involved. Theres a bus stop about 100m away and the buses run every few minutes to everywhere! Just tap in/out with credit card when you get on/off . The nearest underground station is about 6 mins walk at junction with Scott's Rd . Also the Newton hawkers street food market is a 15min walk away. Ideal.for short break .

title: Lovely place for families
desc: Accomodation in the heart of shopping belt orchard road, easy access by bus also. We visited award winning Hua Ting restaurant too and they did not disappoint. Thank you for the helpful and warm services by the front staff too. Appreciate greatly!

title: Fantastic location
desc: This was the first stop of our vacation. Check in was swift and easy, polite and courteous. They took our temperatures, without being invasive, to monitor for illness (we arrived amid the Coronavirus outbreak) We had a triple and a double. Both located in different wings. Rooms were clean and tidy, the third bed was made up after we‚Äôd gone out for food. A decent bed for a ‚Äòput me up‚Äô style. Plenty of room in the bedroom and bathroom, all items covered: iron, hairdryer, toothbrushes, toiletries etc. Only negative for the room was lack of drawer space. A big wardrobe, but not much for just popping t shirt and shorts into. Pool area was clean and tidy, call from the poolside bar to order food/drinks. Pool towels available and good gym facilities too. Breakfast buffet was

title: Five Star All the Way
desc: We did so well choosing to stay at the Orchard Hotel Singapore, The Staff are all so friendly, Very Professional & extremely helpful. Special mention to Kris, Janet, Tina, Jason, sunshine & Zoe who made us feel so welcome & our stay so much more special, We Thank you all. The Hotel itself is so beautiful, very clean, rooms very clean. We stayed in a Club Room, best Club room ever Afternoon Tea & evening snacks & drinks were amazing, The Breakfast Buffet is the best l have ever seen in any hotel in the world, so much choice from so many cuisines, We also ate lunch here again couldn't fault the food. We look forward to staying here again, Thank you for our Holiday Kindest regards York & Darlene

title: Superb Service
desc: We had a two night stay at the Orchard Hotel at the end of a Far East cruise. Our arrival and departure time meant we had three full days in Singapore. We arrived at the hotel just after 9.00 am and had a very swift and professional check in and were in our room and unpacking by 9.15. We had arranged for an upgrade to a room allowing access to the club lounge. This was sorted in advance with the highest level of professionalism by Delilah Hamid Marie (Miss D) who we fortunately met when we were checking in. The standards set by Miss D were replicated across the hotel with every member of staff providing some of the most friendly, professional and courteous service that we have experienced in all of our travels. The staff really are a credit to the hotel. The room on the 11th

title: Excellent
desc: We had very courteous service, great food, conveniently located and superb communication with staff in organizing our arrival for meet and greet at the airport. The buffet breakfast is wonderful and the service staff could not have been more attentive to our comfort after a 21 hour flight.

title: Comfortable well located quality hotel
desc: Tucked away at the end of the Orchard Road shopping street, we found this hotel to be very comfortable and well located. Facilities were good - comfortable spacious room and very good breakfast buffet (check out the robot omelette making machine!). The large outdoor swimming pool was very nice.

title: Relaxing stopover in Singapore.
desc: We spent two nights here en route to New Zealand and another two on our return trip. The room was spacious and comfortable with all necessities provided. We took advantage of upgrading to use the Premier Lounge, which proved exceptional value for money. The staff are extremely attentive and friendly. Nothing is too much trouble. We would like to make a special mention of Yen, Sonia, Amanda and Daisy who looked after us so well. Many thanks Yen for organising our departure. We would highly recommend The Orchard Hotel.

title: Awesome themed Signature Suite
desc: Do not judge a book by its cover! I was pleasantly surprised by the Signature Suite room that my friends booked me for my birthday. The themed experience began right from when the lift doors open, unveiling a ‚ÄòQing dynasty with a dash of modern‚Äô interiors along the corridors, completed with a sweet waft of fragrance in the air. The Suite itself was a nice size with access that goes all the way around the room. Access to the club lounge (that comes with the room booking) and choice of having breakfast either at the lounge or restaurant provided just that edge in guest exclusivity. It was my birthday, so a cake was almost an expected gesture from this hotel group of a behemoth, and they, of course, delivered with impeccable service no less. Props to Chooi Yen and her guest

title: Lunch at Hua Ting
desc: Excellent service. Everything was perfect. Food was great and most importantly the service of the staff. Special mention goes to Aunty Meng Chu and Aires for taking care of my family's table. By far one of the best services I had. Professional, courteous, tactful and aunty Meng Chu's familiar cantonese tongue meticulous service standards made the Birthday meal complete. The birthday longevity buns and cake were awesome. Kudos to the team. Definitely 5 star.

title: Very nice place.
desc: This is an excellent hotel with all one would expect. Very good food , professional, helpful staff and a friendly vibe. A few caveats however. It‚Äôs not in the midst of the Orchard Road shopping area so a taxi ride may be needed. The Chinese restaurant on the second floor has address corpse requiring long trousers and a jacket for men. They offered these to me but I declined. The screens in the pool,area are not adequate to keep out the sun rays. Umbrellas should be provided. BTW-the Intermezzo lobby bar is very nice with a happy hour and good live music. Tasty food can also be gotten here.

title: Great location, wonderful staff
desc: We picked this hotel because of the TripAdvisor recommendation and we absolutely loved it. The hotel is a $30 taxi ride from the airport and we received a warm welcome on arrival. We had a fantastic room and all the staff without exception were very courteous and friendly and made our stay perfect. The breakfast buffet was something else and we just wished we could have tried everything - maybe next time. The hotel is in a great location right off Orchard Road surrounded by great restaurants and shops, and is just two minutes from the MRT station. We're planning to be back at the end of March and are already looking forward to it.

title: Orchard Hotel Singapore
desc: Excellent hotel, great staff, very friendly & professional, the room was very clean and comfortable, its also in a great location at the top of Orchard Road (big shopping district), with an underground station nearby. We had a great visit !

title: Slow Check -in
desc: We arrived at the Orchard Hotel after a long flight from Sydney and had to wait nearly 20 minutes to be checked in, there was only the two of us - not a large group! Check in staff were very polite and friendly but they need more staff. I had to go to the desk on two more occasions during our stay and each time had to wait. When we were checking out I had to "queue jump" as our taxi to the airport was waiting. As Millennium Club members we received a room upgrade but the room was tired and in need of refurbishment. However, the hotel was conveniently situated and we would consider using it again when we are next in Singapore.

title: Safe, Welcoming and Friendly
desc: We just spent four relaxing nights in the Orchard Hotel and we were made to feel safe and welcome. Our room was clean and comfortable, we really enjoyed the pool on our last night, and the breakfast was always excellent. Everyone on staff was friendly, kind, and very capable. Our experience at Orchard Hotel was everything our family looks for in a hotel and we are EXTREMELY happy we stayed there while in Singapore.

title: Exceptional Food- Chinese Cuisine at its Best
desc: At Hua Ting Restaurant, every dish is fabulous. A family favourite, there are many dishes that we regularly order but today, since it was just my husband and I, we decided to try new dishes. Appetizer was ginseng chicken. It was mild and tasty. Would definitely order this again. We love the nourishing soups and each of us had a bowl. We had double boiled garoupa soup and clear broth with white fungus and chicken. The next dish, Wagyu beef served in hot stone bowl with a variety of mushroom, is cooked at the dinner table. It was a feast for the eyes as the server poured sauce over the tender beef slices before lighting it up. We watched with silent anticipation as orange flames rise from the bottom of the bowl, licking the beef slices and turning them brown. The next dish that

title: Singapore Sling
desc: Once again a great hotel with great service and central to all that you would like to see. the tour bus stops right outside. fantastic Mall with lots of choice cuisine to choose from. all within walking distance.

title: Wonderful dinner experience
desc: They did serve delicious food and good service . Especially yongzhe who taking my order with great recommendation. And the staff Poh yee pay alot attention on my table Definitely will be back again...

title: Comfortable and relaxing
desc: We had tea and dinner at bar intermezzo. Food was good and service pleasant and attentive. I liked the musical performance at the bar too in the evening. Breakfast included ala carte hot food fr the menu. Comfortable bed in a clean room. They also have the robot that day delivers to the room. Will return.

title: Nice hotel in singapore
desc: The hotel is very nice, clean, staff very friendly and polite, large and nice rooms. The breakfast at the restaurant is very good. Thank you to the service team. I would like to suggest a little bit that the pool should have more white umbrellas to decorate and romantic. I was a little surprised that in Vietnam, all 4 - 5 star hotels have welcome drinking water upon check-in, and the reception area is always full of tables and chairs for guests, particularly Singapore I have In some hotels, there is no welcome drink even though I booked a high-class room and the reception area was very few seats, guests just stood in check in and then went to the room, perhaps culturally different from each other. reasonable? But I find the way hotels in Vietnam make it easier for them to feel

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: Stayed here many times and have always been impressed with their high quality. With these difficult times they are still maintaining a very high standard. I had no worries staying there and I hope everyone support this excellent hotel even in these trying times. Well done Orchard Hotel. I will be back.

title: Wonderful service
desc: We stayed at Orchard for SHN. We were attended like usual guests. Staff is very attentive, caring, professional and friendly. Our requests and questions were always answered quickly and everything was done for our comfort. In particular, I appreciated the attentions of Mr. Quam Kponton, front line manager, to whom we are grateful.

title: Awesome staff.
desc: Location is great, staff is just perfect and front desk manager is awesome, able to speak french, and helpful when we had a health issue. This place is stressless, thanks to all. Orchard is the equivalent of Singapore "Champs Elys√©e" and the hotel is just at the beginning.

title: Memorable and delightful experience
desc: The Hotel went beyond and provided a complimentary upgrade after hearing about our anniversary. Special thanks to Zoey for conveying it the Guest Experience team, who wrote a card to us for our anniversary and sign off individually, along with a delicious fruit tart. Top-notch room, Outstanding service, with a dedicated team of staffs that provided a memorable experience for us.

title: Staycation at Orchard Hotel
desc: We would like to thank Ms Chin for her professionalism in serving us. She had explained to us patiently when there was no room available yet even though we opted for an early check in. Thereafter, she gave us a room upgrade which we were very much thankful of. We had a wonderful staycation and hope to visit very soon again!

title: Home is where the heart is
desc: It was a misunderstanding at first but I had a great time thanks to your staff. I am a rider so when I reached your hotel, I was welcome by Mr Mohammad the doorman. I was still wearing my helmet when I approached him as I wanted to ask him where am I able to park my bike but the first thing he asked was where am I from but I told him I am his guest he apologised and assisted me from there. When I approached your reception I was welcome by Ms Amanda. The process time was short and efficient. She also offered to store our bags as the room was not ready and she also showed us your pool and we did enjoy the short time at the pool. Unfortunately when we arrived at our room all the amenities for the 3rd person were not met up so we had to call the operator, Ms Lynn to inform her of

title: Home away from Home
desc: It was very refreshing to be back in the Orchard Hotel again, after these troubled Covid months and be so warmly welcomed. The hotel and staff had gone above and beyond to make our stay easy and comfortable. A special mention goes to Mun Keat who looked after us so well during our evening dinners downstairs, making sure we always had full drinks. Thank you all and especially a huge heartfelt thank you to Sharon Tan for going the extra mile and providing the excellent personal service we have come to expect from the Millennium Group.

title: Staycation
desc: Hotel room is very clean and spacious. Location is fantastic as it is near all the shopping areas. I would like to thank and compliment the counter staff Amanda and another Chinese young girl ( sorry I forgotten her name) who were with her, their service were fantastic! They were very friendly, courteous and helpful! I would also like this compliment Tina and an Indian young man ( sorry I forgotten his name too) whom served us at the Orchard Cafe for our afternoon high tea. Both of them were very nice and helpful.

title: Excellent accommodations
desc: Orchard Hotel Singapore is the place to stay, when visiting Singapore, if you are looking for a top notch hotel. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful. The rooms are very nice with adequate space to relax or work. Not once did I have a problem with the internet. The pool is large and the pool area is well maintained. The on-site restaurant is amazing and you are sure to find items to meet everyone‚Äôs taste buds. Be sure to give the Orchard a try during your next visit.

title: A Stay to Remember
desc: Very clean, and comfortable! I love the big bed and comfy linens, staff is THE BEST. I just wanted to write a quick thank you to you and your staff. I am currently serving my stay at home notice at your hotel, and have 4 days left, but thus far your staff has been super accommodating, even to someone who is serving the SHN. I feel really thankful to your staff especially during this crazy time. When I need extra towels, water etc, it always comes so fast, and every time I talk with the staff on the phone they are very friendly and kind.  Thank you for all that you do to make it such a great hotel. You made this whole quarantine situation less stressful and I am very thankful for that!

title: Warm Personal Service
desc: My mum, sister and myself enjoyed a 2-night staycation recently, made so memorable by the delightful and thoughtful service shown by Ms Chin Chooi Yen, the Guest Experience Manager. Upon observing that we were holidaying with our elderly mother, she upgraded us to a spacious suite, a much appreciated gesture. Her warm personal service, even helping us with our luggage despite her petite size, and her attention to our comfort, touched our hearts. Thank you, Ms Chin and staff at Orchard Hotel for a very comfortable, unforgettable stay!

title: Staycation
desc: My family and I went for a birthday staycation on 5sep which is my daughter birthday. It was a very memorable staycation. Upon reaching, I was carrying a lots of luggages, there was a bellboy, Mr Santhanam, who immediately helped me to put all the luggages on the trolley. That was very sweet and thoughtful of him. üëç Next, we proceeded to the registration counter where Mr Kent who helped to arrange a Surprise birthday with a mini rainbow cake for my girl.Wow!!ü•∞so sweet!! My girl was overjoyed with happiness.She and my son ate the yummy cakeü•≥ Only the swimming pool, due to Covid-19 , there was a restriction of only 4 people in the pool which causes a bit of inconvenience to us as we wanted to play and enjoy together as a family. But overall, the breakfast was great!!

title: SHN @ Orchard Hotel - the staff made the difference
desc: All staff was very kind and supporting while we stayed here during our SHN. We were upgraded into a bigger room with very nice Asian decor. Especially, Mr. Kalai was very helpful. He helped us with fixing the light and A/C in an efficient and kind way. Thank you. üôè

title: Staycation
desc: The facade looks of the hotel seems rustic, but it doesn‚Äôt portray the well decorated interior design extending from the lobby till the room. When we first step in, we were greeted by warm smile of their genuine staff. The room was surprisingly spacious, I like the design and modern ‚Äúchic‚Äùconcept. Oh, my kids like their bath tub so much. The pool was indeed a ‚Äúcalling call‚Äù, they utilise the minimal space well. I enjoy swimming with my kids. Breakfast was served to our room. They had variety to choose. The staff was very attentive and demonstrated a pleasant professional hospitality. Would like to commended ms amanda and Mr quam(manager) from the front desk department for their sincere warmed welcome to attended to us. They also arranged for my mum and sister room next to us.

title: Staycation
desc: Staff from security to reception and housekeeping were doing their jobs with excellent. Room was comfortable, clean and the smart TV has good programmes with radio channels. Check-in was smooth and checkout was not crowded. Hotel surrounding has good eateries.

title: Short Staycations holiday with family
desc: Check in process was pretty complicated. Understand is due to the current COVID-19 period but I have another 5 star hotel staycation just weeks before this but it was pretty straight forward and fast process. Appreciate the management can look into improvement. The room was big with 1 king bed and 1 double side sofa bed which fit a family of 5 comfortably. The room cleanliness is fine but the toilet cleanliness can be improved a lot especially the toilet bowl was pretty dirty. Overall it was still not a bad experience but appreciate if the management can look into the above mentioned improvements.

title: Orchard Hotel locking mechanism problem
desc: Mr Kalai fixed the lock mechanism problem and was very efficient. Overall stay have been an amazing experience despite the covid-19 situation. Worth the money with good and helpful staff! Recommended for those who are considering which hotel to have their staycation

title: Great place, with great services
desc: As we are celebrating our 15th anniversary, Orchard Hotel has given us an unexpected experiences. Upon our arrival at the hotel for check-in, their staff, Ms Amanda, has definitely make us feel welcome instead of a hotel, but a home. Ms Amanda has escorted us to their highest level, and their premier suite. This suite has definitely wowed our experiences. It has ample living space, and amenities too. And to celebrate our anniversary, the hotel has compliment us with an anniversary cake. Thank you to Orchard Hotel management and Ms Amanda for making our 15th anniversary, an unforgettable experiences. Especially, when we are unable to travel out of the country in the covid-19 period.

title: Fai
desc: Really great service by the technician Mr Kalai. Thumbs up. Employer should give him a raise. Our fridge was not working and he arrived as soon as possible. Not only that, he recrify the problem almoat instantly. Thanks again mr kalai!

title: Great Customer Service
desc: 1st stay at Orchard Hotel and I must say that the customer service from the frontdesk was wonderful! I had Yen/Yan serving me for both my check in and check out, details and explanatios were clear and they were very accomodating to special requests. Will definitely be back!

title: Great Customer Service
desc: Had a staycation for Fiance's bday celebration from the 4th to the 6th oct. Specifically would like to mention about Amanda from reception. She is warm friendly polite and definately was one reason why I loved my stay there as well. Secondly, rooms were spacious and clean loved it. Besides, I believe most from the reception are great. Call centre could be improved. Overall loved my experience.

title: Fantastic service
desc: Checked in and out was smooth. Room is newly renovated with comfy bed. Special thanks to Siew Mei who helped me during checkin. She was warm and friendly, attentive to my request of late checkout. Thumb-up to her service!

title: Stay at orchard hotel singapore
desc: stayed at the hotel for 2 night and it was awesome. Very nice deco at the lobby and the staff are all very nice and welcoming. Just hope the hotel restaurant can be halal for muslim guest. So it will be more convenient for muslim guest to eat at the hotel.

title: Yachtcation with family 20-22 Nov
desc: Wonderful 5-star experience during our 3d2n stay at Orchard hotel/ Yacht experience. It was our second time here. Location is great, nice 20mins walk to Botanic gardens and 10mins walk to Orchard road beautiful shopping beltway. Signature Mango cake at the cafe is my favorite. Top of the world customer service from Chooi Yen (Front desk Concierge Manager) and Raymond Chiu (F&B Manager). Wonderful first time experience for my kids on-board a Yacht operated by Daniel Ong/co. from JD Yacht Services. Friendly, experience and very knowledgeable pair of ex-naval divers. Will come back again.

title: Nice place to stay
desc: Able to get connecting rooms. Beds and pillows were comfortable. AC working well and temperature adjustment was good. Strong WIFI. Good signal on TV channels. Good shower and bathtub available. Nice swimming pool. We had fun! Fridge was not cold enough, took a long time to make the drinks chilled. Room service was a bit slow, ~20-30mins for bucket of ice, however we waited patiently each time. Will consider returning in the future.

title: Yacht-cation Escape (Suprised 30th Birthday Stayca)
desc: I would like to compliment Ms Farah Vierra (Assistant Reservations Manager) and Ms Perlin Chan (Sales Manager) for assisting me for the Yacht-cation Escape to suprised my friend's 30th birthday. Due to pandemic, the only option is to do a surprise staycation. So i was glad that Millienium Hotels and Resorts are offering a Yacht-cation Escape package where you can have a 1 night stay in the Premier Suite and a yacht experience. Both Ms Farah Vierra and Ms Perlin Chan assisted me with my queries and they planned for the 2D1N itinerary. They are very helpful and i really appreciate their help and patience. And also i would like to compliment Ms Chooi Yen (Front Desk) for a very friendly welcome. All of the Orchard Hotel Staffs are very friendly. The service was a tip top. A great

title: Budget hotel
desc: Stayed here for quarantine, would not recommend for anything, and especially not staycations. Totally does not look like pictures! I've stayed in a lot of hotels the last 2 months and this was by far the worst. Even smaller than what I stayed in in Europe (does not even have a sofa! I felt quite claustrophobic being in there 2 weeks) and room is dated in spite of supposed recent refurbishment. I suspect they included the size of the long corridor in the room size, but it's not like anyone hangs out in the corridor. If anything it's an inconvenience.  Toilet smelled even on day 1. AC does not go above 25C so if you're cold you have no choice. Asked for help, they sent a technician down who told me switch on all the lights, as light emits heat... seriously... Front desk doesn't

title: Wonderful staycation
desc: Special thanks to Zoey for her hospitality and helpfulness, both at check-in and check-out! The room she provided was spacious, modern, comfortable and calm - perfect for a staycation. Also loved the beautiful holiday decorations and Christmas music in the lobby area. Definitely looking forward to another stay soon!

title: Yatch-cation
desc: The hotel rooms are clean and comfortable. The staff are very friendly and helpful. We had a very enjoyable stay. We also enjoyed going on the yatch and playing with the mat and the canoe. Thank you very much for the memories

title: Crap WiFi
desc: It must be embarrassing to only offer a WiFi speed of 25-28 Mbps in the year 2020... especially in Singapooooore...lame Laundry, works very good. Room service, no issues. Staff, very helpful and service minded.

title: Good Experience and Wonderful Staycation
desc: I have a staycation package "Romantic Indulgence" with my partner on November 2020, I was served by the Guest Experience Manager Chin Chooi Yen. I would like to commend Yen on her warm hospitality and her kind attitude towards her customer. My partner and I felt welcomed and was impressed by her excellent services and follow ups from checking in the hotel, pool side dinner, next day delivery of the breakfast and to checking out. It is well planned and managed. She explains all the required information accurately and is very detailed. Orchard Hotel had left me with a very good experience and impression. My partner and I had a memorable and romantic dinner by the pool with the surprise birthday cake. I will certainly choose Orchard Hotel again for future opportunities and stays.

title: Liyana Tan
desc: Excellent location and affordable spacious club rooms. Believe it or not, my husband and I have been staying here for the past 5 weekends straight. Many more stays to come, definitely. And many thanks to the front desk team for the heartwarming stay ‚ù§

title: Memorable
desc: Hotel front desk staff very observantly noted that it was my child's birthday on the day of our checkout and arranged for a cake to be delivered the day before our check out. Thank you for great service!

title: Yachtcation with Hotel
desc: Went with the family on a 2D1N yachtcation purchased from the hotel. The package included - 2PM check-in - 2D1N stay in a Premier Suite at Orchard Hotel - 1 Hi-tea - 1 5-course Chinese dinner at Hua Ting - 4-hr Cruise on the Leviathan in Southern Islands - Picnic Lunch - Late check-out at 6PM The kids enjoyed the experience. After the dinner, we need to walk around Orchard Road to work it off. The cruise to the Southern Islands was very pleasant, and it was surprisingly sunny. The day before and after was drizzling. During the cruise, we had a chance to swim, do some snorkeling (the usual low visibility in Singapor) and kayaking. We departed from the cruise at about 2PM and we had time to chill at the hotel pool before our late check-out. We took a stroll to the nearby Muddy

title: Experience could be better
desc: I‚Äôve stayed in the hotel for 3D2N and I'm disappointed with the hotel. Firstly, in terms of cleanliness, I'm flabbergasted to see the cleanliness of the room was not up to standard. The housekeeper didn't clean the room thoroughly from the last user that occupied the room as there were trash still in the room (as shown in the picture below). I questioned if they did sanitized the room. Secondly, I requested for a king bed but was given 2 beds conjunct together instead. I wish it was stated during the booking or at the counter during check in. I hope the hotel could have look at improving the service standards and the importance of cleanliness, especially during this covid period.

title: Yachtcation getaway
desc: Quick getaway with family. Orchard hotel offered an interesting hotel stay and yacht trip package. The suite room was nice. Staff at the front desk, housekeeping and restaurants were all wonderful & welcoming. Dinner at HuaTing was excellent as expected. He was very patient and assisted us greatly in carrying a great load of items from the ballroom to our room and subsequently, to our car during check out. Ballroom coordinator Mun Ket and banquet director Haze was fantastic as well, their professionalism and dedication were key in making our wedding banquet a great success.

title: Staycation
desc: Sincere thanks and compliments to Chooi Yen and Queenie for the excellent service. Their attention to detail as we made a mistake in our booking and effort to provide service beyond their duties is remarkable. The extra mile to explain the facilities in the property and a little cake for a simple birthday made us really welcomed! Not forgetting that even when masked up, they ‚Äúsmiled‚Äù with their eyes. What makes a stay memorable besides comfort is definitely being well taken care of by true hospitality heros! Appreciate your services and many blessings!

title: Great hotel and people
desc: I have nothing but praise for this hotel, and especially one of its employees Sharron Tan who was everything the Hospitality industry should be, kind, caring, helpful, patient, friendly and a consummate professional. I had problems with my quarantine documents and she kindly helped me with them and with getting them printed. The Hotel is impressive, spacious lounges, good food in the Orchard Cafe, the staff attentive and good at their jobs. The room was very comfortable, spacious and immaculate.

title: Grand Deluxe 22m2 NOT 28m2 (Dont take corner room, even smaller), COLESLAW WAS WARM TO HOT AND SUPER SOUR
desc: As mentioned by a recent review, someone mentioned that the premier room 35m2 doesnt look like 35m2 at all. From my personal stay twice with the hotel, Grand Deluxe room is 22m2, NOT 28m2. Got cheated by the 28m2 room size to book their grand deluxe room. As seen from my images, the walking gap is only the size of a pillow.. The walking gap, be it toilet to the cupboard, both sides of the bed to the wall, all are only the size of a pillow. If you have two person walking, you would have to walk like a crab. Stayed at Orchard hotel earlier on this year, spending $151 per night. Was allocated a corner room. The corner room was even worst, the size is even smaller than the middle room. I have spoken to the reception, and was given another room (which is at the middle floor, which

title: Great for Family Staycation
desc: Our 6-month old baby had her first ever staycation at Orchard Hotel, and we have everything we need for this first experience with an infant. The front desk counter's service was impeccable; the staff were hospitable and warm. They left a very good first impression of our stay. The service among the hotel staff were good as well, be it the housekeeping, security or other staff. We stayed in a Premier King Room. While not the newest, it was spacious enough to place a cot beside our King Size Bed. The location of the hotel meant we were never far from the major shopping centres and eateries, so food and transport was never an issue despite us not driving. Would greatly recommend Orchard Hotel for all families with young children.

title: Nice experience!
desc: Greeted with warm smiles the moment you enter the hotel for check-in. Special thanks to staffs ChooiYen, Queenie, Nelson for making this birthday stay memorable & the team for the well wishes card + souvenirs. - On the side note for improvement: *Personally feel that the food selection was limited for breakfast. Breakfast experience 5/10. *Musky smell. Any diffuser / aroma scent in the room would be nice! - Overall experience: Enjoyable!

title: Bad Impression For 1st Day Check-in
desc: It's was such disappointing to discovered that my bedsheets was sticking a single hair of someone's. As after I checked in to the room 1220 less than 30 minutes on 3rd March 2021. At once I call the operator. Less than 10 minutes a Chinese lady arrived to my room. As I showed her the hair. She still can ask me wanna change new bedsheets or not... really kind of extra foolish question. As she changes it after my answer is Yes. After all its my 1st time to choose staying this hotel. For such simple mistake. it's really gave me kind of feeling I won't want to recommend my contacts to consider choosing this hotel for rooms check-in. It's kind of very sensitive issues for this Covid 19 period that my sleeping bedsheets that have someone's hair left over.

title: 3.5/5 - acceptable
desc: Overall stay is acceptable. Positive : -booked premium 35m sq -fittings are new as newly renovated -pool size is standard ok -in the heart of orchard Negative BUT can be improve overtime : - missing covid pack - pool booking is not inform during check in that require online pre booking (thanks to the security for letting in as still empty Thou room is not ready when requested for early check in at 1100hrs..was advice to wait for another 1-1.5hrs and will be called once avail. Waited with no updates until checked within 1hrs and was given the room keys. Staffs are friendly... Take note: -best to prebook your early check in online -long Q to be expected during check in (3pm onwards) due to the overwhelm esp during this covid period

title: Good experience with the hotel staff and room.
desc: I was serving my 21 days with my 3years old son. Despite the pandemic situation, the hotel staff was warm, helpful, accommodating. I think that they need to improve the hotel food that was served during shn and the checking in procedure. I hope that they can expedite the process especially family with toddlers/kids. Overall experience was excellent!

title: Excelent service
desc: Very good service,nice foods,very good accommodation,hospitable crew like sofia,ex and others.on time the food delivered as you enter the room somebody will entertain you for the foods and other services

title: Staycation
desc: Had a wonderful experience staying at Orchard Hotel. Right from checking-in, to room service, everything was seamless. The room we stayed in was spotless and the malls we were able to reach in walking distance added to the great experience we had during our stay.

title: Awesome stay
desc: Thank you for the warm hospitality! Fast check in by Quam. Espress checkout option available- just drop keys and key card holder into express check out box, genius! Friendly staff from the time you enter the hotel till you check out. Efficient housekeeping Wei Ying (hope I get your name right) in sending items. Clean and comfortable room. Will be back!!

title: Staycation
desc: Check-in was swift and fuss-free. The duty front-desk staff, Sara was very helpful and courteous, and she promptly arranged a complimentary room upgrade for me and my wife upon request. This made us feel really special. The room was well-maintained and spotless. The dining experience was fabulous, too. Overall, we enjoyed our staycation at this hotel thoroughly.

title: Why isnt this hotel more popular??
desc: Absolutely comfortable stay, the service staff were helpful and friendly. We had a stuck shower head and it was replaced quickly with just a call. Checkout was instant too, and we can leave our luggage with the concierge while we head out for lunch.

title: SAD decline of Orchard Hotel Singapore
desc: My previous stay had been pleasant so i booked confidently this time around and even pre-paid for a month's stay (01-29 April 2021). I would come to regret this! As service was abysmal, i requested to shorten my stay but Hotel was not agreeable. Check-in: "Darren" checked me in. Smooth process; minimal conversation = cold welcome! I offered my CC, he declined. I discovered later, when i met friends at the Orchard Cafe for drinks that i couldn't sign charges to my room. The Orchard Cafe lady informed me, "You're not allowed to charge anything." WOW! Room: Pros: Spacious. Cons: Dusty mirrors and counter areas. Air-con was not cold and sink had a water draining problem. Sink was boat-shaped in design; lovely to look at but not functional! Narrow part of sink is closest to tap;

title: Amazing experience.
desc: Check in to the room on 17th on a two days stay. Waiting time and process was smooth. Breakfast was great with good choice of variety. Was specially satisfied with one of front desk a lady with long hair and specs. Regret not getting her name to comment of her good services. While checking out, as i was with two luggages and one small one for my child. Was impressed when this lady rush over to inform one of the staff to help us with the load. This small gesture really brighten up our day and let visitors come back for staycation at the hotel. thank you !

title: Staycation Review
desc: Room is spacious. Aircon is not cold throughout the night. Was warm at times. Was expecting alot of amenities for a clubroom, but disappointed. Couldn't increase volume on TV, as neighbouring room could hear, but it was still soft for us. Breakfast is good and filling. Lucky never opt for buffet. Well, as a whole, a good-average stay.

title: Experience commensurate with pricing
desc: Had the opportunity to book a slot for check in but upon reaching, was told that the room wasn't going to be ready until 2hrs later. Felt that if this was the case I shouldn't have been allowed to book an early check in slot. Nonetheless, we decided to try our luck 1hr later and they had an available room. This room seemed a bit dated and had certain deficiencies like a broken door and work out wallpaper. Called engineering to have it rectified but after they came they were unable to solve the door issue and suggested we change room. The second room had much better decor and seemed newer. Overall experience was good given the price. Both rooms were the same size but the newer one appeared bigger as the toilet was smaller. However if we had stayed in the first room throughout

title: Staycay
desc: Place was clean, staff was friendly and helpful. Room was spacious. Overall a great value for money. As for location, multiple convenient stores nearby, bus stop right in front of the hotel that is 2 stops away from the shopping belt of orchard.

title: Disappointed

On our last stay in November 2020, we noticed a slight decline in certain aspects of the hotel but needless to say, because of COVID-19 we kind of excused it away. We initially booked two nights, then extended for the third night for our 9th year anniversary. We checked in at 4pm (check in‚Äôs are at 3pm) and was told that check out would be at 11am! Thank you Mr Quam Kponton (Front Office Manager) and Ms Nithya (Duty Manager I believe) for going above and beyond your call of duty. I had a severe allergic reaction in my room on my first day of arrival and had to teleconsult my doctor as we aren‚Äôt able to step out of our room during our SHN period.
